GK21sokss_pu:20788: mahānsārthadharo nāma vṛttāntaṃ pṛcchati sma ca // SoKss_9,6.38 //
GK21sokss_pu:20789: sa tamāśvāsya kṛpayā śiśuṃ dṛṣṭvā sulakṣaṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:20790: sārthavāho nināya svaṃ deśaṃ svasṛsakhaṃ tataḥ // SoKss_9,6.39 //
GK21sokss_pu:20792: sadane tasya vaṇijaḥ putrasnehena paśyataḥ // SoKss_9,6.40 //
GK21sokss_pu:20797: sa viśrānto 'tra taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahīpālaṃ śubhākṛtim /
GK21sokss_pu:20800: tasmādyayāce 'patyārthī mantrī tadbhaginīṃ ca tām // SoKss_9,6.44 //
GK21sokss_pu:20801: tatas tau tena vaiśyena dattāvādāya dārakau /
GK21sokss_pu:20805: atrāntare ca baddhaṃ taṃ candrasvāminametya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20806: bhillādhipaḥ siṃhadaṃṣṭraḥ pallyāṃ tasyām abhāṣata // SoKss_9,6.47 //
GK21sokss_pu:20808: yathā saṃpūjya moktavyo na hantavyo mayā bhavān // SoKss_9,6.48 //
GK21sokss_pu:20809: taduttiṣṭha vraja svecchamity uktvā sa mumoca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:20816: taṃ sa vipro gṛhapatiścandrasvāminam abhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:20819: tau cādāyātibhavyau dvau dārakau sa ito gataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20820: nārikelamahādvīpe noktaṃ tannāma tena tu // SoKss_9,6.54 //
GK21sokss_pu:20821: tac chrutvā māmakāveva nūnaṃ tāviti cintayan /
GK21sokss_pu:20822: candrasvāmī matiṃ cakre gantuṃ dvīpavaraṃ sa tam // SoKss_9,6.55 //
GK21sokss_pu:20824: sa vyadhātsaṃgatiṃ dvīpaṃ nārikelaṃ prayāsyatā // SoKss_9,6.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:20825: tenaiva ca sahāruhya yānapātraṃ jagāma saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20826: candrasvāmī sutasnehād dvīpam abdhipathena tam // SoKss_9,6.57 //
GK21sokss_pu:20830: gataḥ kaṭāhadvīpaṃ tu tadyuktaḥ sa ito 'dhunā // SoKss_9,6.59 //
GK21sokss_pu:20831: tac chrutvā sa tato vipro vaṇijā dānavarmaṇā /
GK21sokss_pu:20833: tatrāpi sa dvijo 'śrauṣīd gataṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20836: vaṇigbhiḥ saha gatvāpi taṃ prāpa vaṇijaṃ na saḥ // SoKss_9,6.62 //
GK21sokss_pu:20837: siṃhalebhyastu śuśrāva gataṃ taṃ vaṇijaṃ nijam /
GK21sokss_pu:20839: tataḥ koṭīśvarākhyena vaṇijā sa samaṃ yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:20841: tasmin kanakavarmāṇaṃ vaṇijaṃ tam avāpa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20842: ācakhyau cākhilaṃ tasmai svodantaṃ dārakotsukaḥ // SoKss_9,6.65 //
GK21sokss_pu:20843: tataḥ kanakavarmā tau jñātārtiḥ so 'sya dārakau /
GK21sokss_pu:20844: darśayām āsa yau tena labdhā nītavaraṇyataḥ // SoKss_9,6.66 //
GK21sokss_pu:20846: tāvannaiva tadīyau tau tāvanyāveva kaucana // SoKss_9,6.67 //
GK21sokss_pu:20847: tataḥ sabāṣpaṃ śokārto nirāśo vilalāpa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20848: iyadbhrāntvāpi hā prāpto na putro na sutā mayā // SoKss_9,6.68 //
GK21sokss_pu:20849: dhātrā kuprabhuṇevāśā darśitā me na pūritā /
GK21sokss_pu:20850: bhrāmito 'smi ca mithyaiva dūrāddūraṃ durātmanā // SoKss_9,6.69 //
GK21sokss_pu:20852: āśvāsitaḥ sa tenātha candrasvāmī śucābravīt // SoKss_9,6.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:20853: vatsareṇātmajau tau cenna prāpsyāmi bhuvaṃ bhraman /
GK21sokss_pu:20855: ity uktavantaṃ tatrastho jñānī ko'pi tam abhyadhat /
GK21sokss_pu:20857: tac chrutvā sa prahṛṣṭātmā bhāskarānugrahaṃ smaran /
GK21sokss_pu:20859: tato 'grahārān grāmāṃś ca cinvan sa nagarāṇi ca /
GK21sokss_pu:20860: bhraman prāpaikadā sāyaṃ vanaṃ prāṃśubahudrumam // SoKss_9,6.74 //
GK21sokss_pu:20861: tatra kṣapayituṃ rātriṃ kṛtvā vṛttiṃ phalāmbubhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20863: anidraś ca niśīthe 'tra dadarśa sa taroradhaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20866: pratīkṣamāṇaṃ devasya bhair avasya kilāgamam // SoKss_9,6.77 //
GK21sokss_pu:20867: cirayaty adya kiṃ deva iti tatra ca mātaraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20868: nārāyaṇīm athāpṛcchan sā jahāsa tu nābravīt // SoKss_9,6.78 //
GK21sokss_pu:20872: tasya vidyādharī nāma khyātarūpāsti cātmajā // SoKss_9,6.80 //
GK21sokss_pu:20873: pradeyāyāś ca tenāsyā rājñā rūpasamaḥ śrutaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20874: vimalākhyasya tanayo rājño nāmnā prabhākaraḥ // SoKss_9,6.81 //
GK21sokss_pu:20875: tasmai ditsati tāṃ tasminrājñi tenāpi sā śrutā /
GK21sokss_pu:20880: prabhākarāya tasmai tāṃ suraseno yathāvidhi // SoKss_9,6.84 //
GK21sokss_pu:20881: tataḥ sā prapya vimalapurākhyaṃ śvāśuraṃ puram /
GK21sokss_pu:20882: vidyādharī samaṃ bhartrā śayanīyam agān niśi // SoKss_9,6.85 //
GK21sokss_pu:20885: hā hatāsmiḥ kathaṃ ṣaṇḍhaḥ patiḥ prāpto mayeti sā /
GK21sokss_pu:20886: śocantī cetasā rātriṃ rājaputrī nināya tām // SoKss_9,6.87 //
GK21sokss_pu:20888: iti lekhaṃ likhitvā ca pitre sā prāhiṇottataḥ // SoKss_9,6.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:20892: putrāya tatphalaṃ bhuṅkṣva paśya tvām etya hanmy aham // SoKss_9,6.90 //
GK21sokss_pu:20893: iti tasmai svalekhena saṃdideśa sa bhūpatiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20897: tatas taṃ piṅgadattākhyo mantrī vimalam abhyadhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:20898: eka evāstyupāyo 'tra taṃ deva śreyase kuru // SoKss_9,6.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:20899: asti sthūlaśirā nāma yakṣas tasya ca vedmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:20900: mantramārādhanaṃ yena varamiṣṭaṃ dadāti saḥ // SoKss_9,6.94 //
GK21sokss_pu:20902: liṅgaṃ yācasva putrārthaṃ sadyaḥ śāmyatu vigrahaḥ // SoKss_9,6.95 //
GK21sokss_pu:20903: ity ukto mantriṇā tasmān mantram ādāya taṃ nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20904: sutārthaṃ yakṣamārādhya sa taṃ liṅgamayācata // SoKss_9,6.96 //
GK21sokss_pu:20905: tena saṃprati datte ca liṅge yakṣeṇa tatsutaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20906: pumān prabhākaraḥ so 'bhūd yakṣas tvāsīn napuṃsakaḥ // SoKss_9,6.97 //
GK21sokss_pu:20907: sā tu vidyādharī dṛṣṭvā pumāṃsaṃ taṃ prabhākaram /
GK21sokss_pu:20909: bhrāntāhaṃ madadoṣeṇa na me bhartā napuṃsakaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20910: pumānevaiṣa subhago nātra kāryānyathā matiḥ // SoKss_9,6.99 //
GK21sokss_pu:20912: pitre sā prāhiṇollekhaṃ śamaṃ bheje ca tena saḥ // SoKss_9,6.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:20913: etaṃ jñātvā ca vṛttāntaṃ bhair aveṇādya kupyatā /
GK21sokss_pu:20914: ānāyya sa sthulaśirāḥ śapto devena guhyakaḥ // SoKss_9,6.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:20916: ṣaṇḍha eva bhavājīvaṃ pumān so 'stu prabhākaraḥ // SoKss_9,6.102 //
GK21sokss_pu:20918: prabhākaraś ca puruṣībhūto bhogasukhāya saḥ // SoKss_9,6.103 //
GK21sokss_pu:20920: jāto vilambaḥ kṣiprāc ca jānītāgatam eva tam // SoKss_9,6.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:20923: saṃpūjitaś ca sarvābhir upahāraiḥ sa mātṛbhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20925: tac ca sarvaṃ taroḥ pṛṣṭhāccandrasvāmī vilokayan /
GK21sokss_pu:20926: nārāyaṇyā dadarśaikāṃ dāsīṃ sāpi tamaikṣata // SoKss_9,6.107 //
GK21sokss_pu:20928: sā ca nārāyaṇī devī tathābhūtau viveda tau // SoKss_9,6.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:20929: gate 'tha mātṛsahite bhair ave sā vilambya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:20931: avaruhyāgataṃ taṃ ca svadāsīṃ tāṃ ca sā tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20933: asti devīti vijñaptā tābhyāṃ tathyaṃ tataś ca sā /
GK21sokss_pu:20934: devī vimuktakopā taṃ candrasvāminam abhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.111 //
GK21sokss_pu:20935: satyenoktena tuṣṭāhaṃ yuvayor na śapāmi vām /
GK21sokss_pu:20936: dadāmyetāṃ tu dāsīṃ te bhavataṃ nirvṛtau yuvām // SoKss_9,6.112 //
GK21sokss_pu:20937: tac chrutvā so 'bravīdvipro devi yady api cañcalam /
GK21sokss_pu:20938: mano ruṇadhmi tadapi spṛśāmi na parastriyam // SoKss_9,6.113 //
GK21sokss_pu:20939: manasaḥ prakṛtirhyeṣā rakṣyaṃ pāpaṃ tu kāyikam /
GK21sokss_pu:20940: ityūcivāṃsaṃ taṃ dhīraṃ vipraṃ devī jagāda sā // SoKss_9,6.114 //
GK21sokss_pu:20941: prītāsmi te varaś cāyaṃ putrādīñ śīghram apsyasi /
GK21sokss_pu:20942: idaṃ cotpalam amlāyi viṣādighnaṃ gṛhāṇa me // SoKss_9,6.115 //
GK21sokss_pu:20943: ity uktvā nīrajaṃ dattvā candrasvāmidvijasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:20944: nārāyaṇī sadāsīkā devī tasya tirodadhe // SoKss_9,6.116 //
GK21sokss_pu:20945: sa ca prāptotpalo rātrau kṣīṇāyāṃ prasthitas tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20946: tārāpuraṃ tan nagaraṃ prāpa vipraḥ paribhraman // SoKss_9,6.117 //
GK21sokss_pu:20947: yatrāsya sa sthitaḥ putro mahīpālaḥ sutā ca sā /
GK21sokss_pu:20948: anantasvāminas tasya gṛhe viprasya mantriṇaḥ // SoKss_9,6.118 //
GK21sokss_pu:20949: tatra gatvā sa tasyaiva mantriṇo bhojanepsayā /
GK21sokss_pu:20950: dvāre prādhyayanaṃ cakre śrutvā tamatithiṃ priyam // SoKss_9,6.119 //
GK21sokss_pu:20951: sa ca mantrī pratīhārair āvedyāntaḥ praveśitam /
GK21sokss_pu:20952: nyamantrayata dṛṣṭvaiva vidvāṃsaṃ bhojanāya tam // SoKss_9,6.120 //
GK21sokss_pu:20953: nimantrito 'tha sa śrutvā tatra pāpaharaṃ saraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20956: hākaṣṭaśabdaṃ śuśrāva nagare tatra sa dvijaḥ // SoKss_9,6.122 //
GK21sokss_pu:20958: iha sthito mahīpālo nāma brāhmaṇaputrakaḥ // SoKss_9,6.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:20962: putrīkṛtaś cāputreṇa sa tena priyatāṃ gataḥ // SoKss_9,6.125 //
GK21sokss_pu:20964: so 'dya kṛṣṇāhinā daṣṭastena hāhāravaḥ pure // SoKss_9,6.126 //
GK21sokss_pu:20965: etac chrutvā sa evaiṣa matputra iti cintayan /
GK21sokss_pu:20966: āyayau tvaritaścandrasvāmī mantrigṛhaṃ sa tat // SoKss_9,6.127 //
GK21sokss_pu:20967: tatra sarvair vṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā parijñāya ca taṃ sutam /
GK21sokss_pu:20969: aḍhaukayac ca nāsāyāṃ mahīpālasya tasya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:20971: uttasthau ca mahīpālo nidrāyukta ivāsta saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20972: pure cātrotsavaṃ cakre janaḥ sarvaḥ sarājakaḥ // SoKss_9,6.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:20973: candrasvāmī ca sa tadā devāṃśaḥ ko 'py asāv iti /
GK21sokss_pu:20974: anantasvāminā paurai rājñā cārthair apūjyata // SoKss_9,6.131 //
GK21sokss_pu:20975: tasthau ca tatraiva sukhaṃ mantriveśmani so 'rcitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:20976: paśyan putraṃ mahīpālaṃ sutāṃ candravatīṃ ca tām // SoKss_9,6.132 //
GK21sokss_pu:20980: rājā bandhumatīṃ nāma tārāvarmā dadau sutām // SoKss_9,6.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:20982: sukhī rājyabharaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sa nṛpo 'nanyaputrakaḥ // SoKss_9,6.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:20983: mahīpālo 'pi sa prāptarājyaḥ prakhyāpya taṃ nijam /
GK21sokss_pu:20984: pitaraṃ svānujāṃ sthāne dattvā tasthau yathāsukham // SoKss_9,6.136 //
GK21sokss_pu:20985: ekadā taṃ pitā candrasvāmī svair am abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:20986: ehi svadeśaṃ gacchāvo māturānayanāya te // SoKss_9,6.137 //
GK21sokss_pu:20987: rājyasthaṃ tvāṃ hi buddhvā sā kathaṃ tenāsmi vismṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:20990: tathā caitāṃ purāvṛttāṃ vaṇikputrakathāṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_9,6.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:20999: tatsthāḥ ke 'pi hṛtāstoyair makaraiḥ ke 'pi bhakṣitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21000: cakrastvāyurbalānnītvā tīre kṣiptaś ca vīcibhiḥ // SoKss_9,6.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:21002: pāśahastaṃ dadarśaikaṃ puruṣaṃ sa vaṇiksutaḥ // SoKss_9,6.145 //
GK21sokss_pu:21006: nītvā pāśabhṛtā lohamaye gehe nyaveśyata // SoKss_9,6.147 //
GK21sokss_pu:21008: mūrdhni taptena lauhena cakreṇa bhramatāniśam // SoKss_9,6.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:21010: ityapṛcchatsa cakrastaṃ so 'pyevaṃ pratyuvāca tam // SoKss_9,6.149 //
GK21sokss_pu:21011: khaḍgākhyo 'haṃ vaṇikputraḥ pitroryac ca vaco mayā /
GK21sokss_pu:21012: na kṛtaṃ tena saṃkruddhau tau māmaśapatāṃ krudhā // SoKss_9,6.150 //
GK21sokss_pu:21014: tadīdṛśyeva te pīḍā durācāra bhaviṣyati // SoKss_9,6.151 //
GK21sokss_pu:21015: ity uktvā tau viramyobhau rudantaṃ māmavocatām /
GK21sokss_pu:21016: mā rodīrekamevāstu māsaṃ pīḍā tavedṛśī // SoKss_9,6.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:21018: niśi svapna ivādrākṣaṃ bhīmaṃ puruṣamāgatam // SoKss_9,6.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:21020: kṣipto nyastaṃ ca me mūrdhni jvalaccakramidaṃ bhramat // SoKss_9,6.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:21021: iti me pitṛśāpo 'yaṃ tena prāṇa na yānti me /
GK21sokss_pu:21022: sa ca māso 'dya saṃpūrṇo na ca mucye tathāpy aham // SoKss_9,6.155 //
GK21sokss_pu:21023: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ khaḍgaṃ sa cakraḥ sakṛpo 'bravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:21024: pitroḥ pravasatārthārthaṃ mayāpi na kṛtaṃ vacaḥ // SoKss_9,6.156 //
GK21sokss_pu:21025: prāptaṃ naṅkṣyati te vittamiti māṃ śapataḥ sma tau /
GK21sokss_pu:21026: tenābdhau me dhanaṃ naṣṭaṃ kṛtsnaṃ dvīpāntarārjitam // SoKss_9,6.157 //
GK21sokss_pu:21027: eṣaiva vārtā cānyatra tatko 'rtho jīvitena me /
GK21sokss_pu:21028: dehyetanmūrdhni me cakraṃ khaḍga śāpo 'payātu te // SoKss_9,6.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:21029: iti cakre vadaty eva vāṇī divyātra śuśruve /
GK21sokss_pu:21030: khaḍga mukto 'si cakrasya mūrdhny etac cakramarpaya // SoKss_9,6.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:21032: khaḍgaḥ kenāpyadṛśyena ninye pitṛhṛhaṃ tataḥ // SoKss_9,6.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:21034: cakrastvādāya tanmūrdhni cakraṃ tatraivam abhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.161 //
GK21sokss_pu:21036: ā papakṣayametanme cakraṃ bhrāmyatu mūrdhani // SoKss_9,6.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:21037: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ cakraṃ dhīrasattvaṃ nabhaḥsthitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21040: pāpaṃ te vraja vittaṃ ca tavākṣayyaṃ bhaviṣyati // SoKss_9,6.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:21041: ity uktavatsu deveṣu cakrasya śirasaḥ kṣaṇāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21042: āyasaṃ tasya taccakraṃ jagāma kvāpy adarśanam // SoKss_9,6.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:21045: aṅke kṛtvaiva taṃ cakraṃ nagaraṃ dhavalābhidham /
GK21sokss_pu:21046: nijaṃ tatprāpayām āsa jagāma ca yathāgatam // SoKss_9,6.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:21051: kāmadhenus tu tadbhaktis tatrāpyetāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:21052: āsīt ko'pi muniḥ pūrvaṃ vanacārī mahātapāḥ // SoKss_9,6.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:21054: viṣṭhā kadācin muktābhūt so 'tha kruddho dadarśa tām // SoKss_9,6.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:21055: dṛṣṭam atraiva sā tena balākā bhasmasādabhūt /
GK21sokss_pu:21056: tapaḥ prabhāvāhaṃkāraṃ sa ca bheje tato muniḥ // SoKss_9,6.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:21057: ekadā nagare kvāpi sa brāhmaṇagṛhaṃ muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21058: ekaṃ praviśya gṛhiṇīṃ tatra bhikṣāmayācata // SoKss_9,6.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:21060: iti taṃ sā ca gṛhiṇī nijagāda pativratā // SoKss_9,6.174 //
GK21sokss_pu:21061: tatas taṃ kruddhayā dṛṣṭyā vīkṣamāṇaṃ vihasya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:21062: abhāṣata mune nāhaṃ balākā mṛṣyatām iti // SoKss_9,6.175 //
GK21sokss_pu:21066: sādhvī bhikṣāṃ samādāya tasyāgādantikaṃ muneḥ // SoKss_9,6.177 //
GK21sokss_pu:21068: kathaṃ balākāvṛttāntaḥ parokṣo 'pi mama tvayā // SoKss_9,6.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:21069: jñāta ityādito brūhi bhikṣāṃ gṛhṇāmyahaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21071: na bhartṛbhakter aparaṃ dharmaṃ kaṃcana vedmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:21074: gatvā paśya tataḥ śreyo nirahaṃkāramāpsyasi // SoKss_9,6.181 //
GK21sokss_pu:21075: evaṃ sarvavidā proktaḥ sa pativratayā muniḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21079: dharmavyādhaś ca dṛṣṭvaiva sa taṃ munim abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:21080: kiṃ pativratayā brahmanniha tvaṃ preṣitastayā // SoKss_9,6.184 //
GK21sokss_pu:21082: īdṛśaṃ te kathaṃ jñānaṃ māṃsavikrayiṇaḥ sataḥ // SoKss_9,6.185 //
GK21sokss_pu:21083: ity uktavantaṃ tamṛṣiṃ dharmavyādho jagāda saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21086: śaye śayitayostena jñānam īdṛgvidhaṃ mama // SoKss_9,6.187 //
GK21sokss_pu:21090: naiva kurvo mune tena nirbādhajñānamāvayoḥ // SoKss_9,6.189 //
GK21sokss_pu:21091: tasmāttvam apy ahaṃkāraṃ muktvā śuddhyai munivrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21092: svadharmaṃ cara yenāśu paraṃ jyotiravāpsyasi // SoKss_9,6.190 //
GK21sokss_pu:21094: gatvā dṛṣṭvā ca taccaryāṃ munistuṣṭo vanaṃ yayau // SoKss_9,6.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:21097: eṣa prabhāvo bhaktānāṃ patyau pitari mātari /
GK21sokss_pu:21098: tadehi saṃbhāvaya tāṃ mātaraṃ darśanotsukām // SoKss_9,6.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:21102: tenāttabhāraḥ sa tataḥ prāyātpitṛsakho niśi // SoKss_9,6.195 //
GK21sokss_pu:21103: kramātprāpya svadeśaṃ ca jananīṃ darśanena tām /
GK21sokss_pu:21106: tatra mātṛyutaḥ pitrā vṛttāntākhyāyinā saha // SoKss_9,6.197 //
GK21sokss_pu:21108: niśākṣaye bandhumatī sāntaḥ suptā vyabudhyata // SoKss_9,6.198 //
GK21sokss_pu:21109: buddhvā ca taṃ patiṃ kvāpi gataṃ virahaviklavā /
GK21sokss_pu:21110: na lebhe sā ratiṃ kvāpi prāsādopavanādiṣu // SoKss_9,6.199 //
GK21sokss_pu:21113: yāmi kāryeṇa kenāpi śīghrameṣyāmi ceti me /
GK21sokss_pu:21114: svair amuktvaiva sa gatastanmā putri śucaṃ kṛthāḥ // SoKss_9,6.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:21118: pūjayantī sadaivāsīd dānaiḥ sā dvijapuṃgavān // SoKss_9,6.203 //
GK21sokss_pu:21122: kaś cittathāpi devyatra kāryā naivādhṛtistvayā // SoKss_9,6.205 //
GK21sokss_pu:21124: tathā ca yanmayā dṛṣṭamāścaryaṃ vacmi tacchṛṇu // SoKss_9,6.206 //
GK21sokss_pu:21127: tato 'kasmāc ca nirgatya khaḍgapāṇiḥ pumān gṛhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21130: dūrāt sakautukaś cāhaṃ paśyan nāsamalakṣitaḥ // SoKss_9,6.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:21132: militāya ca tattasmai yathādṛṣṭaṃ mayoditam // SoKss_9,6.210 //
GK21sokss_pu:21136: tatra me suciraṃ sevāmekaḥ pāśupato vyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.212 //
GK21sokss_pu:21137: sa pṛṣṭaḥ kāraṇaṃ svair aṃ bilakhaḍgaprasādhane /
GK21sokss_pu:21138: sahāyaṃ prārthayata māṃ pratipannaṃ mayā ca tat // SoKss_9,6.214 //
GK21sokss_pu:21139: tato mayā sahāraṇyaṃ gatvā homādinā niśi /
GK21sokss_pu:21140: prakaṭīkṛtya vivaraṃ sa māṃ pāśupato 'bhyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.215 //
GK21sokss_pu:21141: vīra praviśa pūrvaṃ tvaṃ khaḍgaṃ prāpya ca māmapi /
GK21sokss_pu:21142: praveśayestvaṃ nirgatya samayaṃ cātra me kuru // SoKss_9,6.216 //
GK21sokss_pu:21143: ity uktastena tasyāhaṃ kṛtvā samayamāśu tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21144: praviśya vivaraṃ prāpamekaṃ ratnamayaṃ gṛham // SoKss_9,6.217 //
GK21sokss_pu:21146: antaḥ prāveśayatpremṇā prādāt khaḍgaṃ ca sātra me // SoKss_9,6.218 //
GK21sokss_pu:21148: rakṣerity uktavatyāhaṃ tayā tatrāvasaṃ saha // SoKss_9,6.219 //
GK21sokss_pu:21156: mām ādāyaiva niṣkālya vivarāt prākṣipadbahiḥ // SoKss_9,6.223 //
GK21sokss_pu:21161: iti yāvattribhuvanaḥ sa rājā devi vakti mām /
GK21sokss_pu:21164: sa rājā tena bhūyaś ca prabhāvaṃ divyamāptavān // SoKss_9,6.227 //
GK21sokss_pu:21168: prāptayā sa svayā sākaṃ siddhyaivāsurakanyayā // SoKss_9,6.229 //
GK21sokss_pu:21170: kṛtaghnāścirasiddhārthā api bhraśyanti hi dhruvam // SoKss_9,6.230 //
GK21sokss_pu:21174: iti tasmāddvijāc chrutvā toṣaṃ bandhumatī yayau // SoKss_9,6.232 //
GK21sokss_pu:21175: cakāra ca kṛtārthaṃ taṃ vipraṃ dattvā dhanaṃ bahu /
GK21sokss_pu:21179: na sa devi mayā dṛṣṭastvadbhartā kvāpi kiṃ tvaham /
GK21sokss_pu:21181: tadāsu saumanasyaṃ te bhāvītyākhyāti me manaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21183: tathā ca kathayāmyetāmatra devi kathāṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:21189: bhīmenāpi vicitya kṣmāṃ dadṛśe tena rājasu /
GK21sokss_pu:21190: na nalādaparo rājā tulyaḥ svaduhituḥ patiḥ // SoKss_9,6.240 //
GK21sokss_pu:21195: sa baddho divyahaṃsastām uvāca vyaktayā girā /
GK21sokss_pu:21196: rājaputryupakāraṃ te kariṣyāmi vimuñca mām // SoKss_9,6.243 //
GK21sokss_pu:21197: naiṣadho 'sti nalo nāma rājā hṛdi vahanti yam /
GK21sokss_pu:21198: sadguṇair gumphitaṃ hāram iva divyāṅganā api // SoKss_9,6.244 //
GK21sokss_pu:21199: tasya tvaṃ sadṛśī bhāryā bhartā sa sadṛśastava /
GK21sokss_pu:21200: tad atra tulyasaṃyoge kāmadūto bhavāmi vām // SoKss_9,6.245 //
GK21sokss_pu:21201: tac chrutvā divyahaṃsaṃ sā matvā satyābhibhāṣiṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:21202: mumoca damayantī tam evamastviti vādinī // SoKss_9,6.246 //
GK21sokss_pu:21203: na mayā varaṇīyo 'nyo nalāditi jagāda ca /
GK21sokss_pu:21205: sa ca haṃsastato gatvā niṣedhaṣvāśu śiśriye /
GK21sokss_pu:21207: nalaḥ sa rājā dṛṣṭvā taṃ rājahaṃsaṃ manoramam /
GK21sokss_pu:21210: iha tvadupakārārthamāgataḥ śṛṇu vacmi te // SoKss_9,6.250 //
GK21sokss_pu:21212: damayantīti duhitā spṛhaṇīyā surair api // SoKss_9,6.251 //
GK21sokss_pu:21214: tayā bhartā vṛtastac ca tavāhaṃ vaktumāgataḥ // SoKss_9,6.252 //
GK21sokss_pu:21216: viśikhaiś ca sa puṣpeṣornalaḥ samamavidhyata // SoKss_9,6.253 //
GK21sokss_pu:21217: abravītsa ca haṃsaṃ taṃ dhanyo 'haṃ vihagottama /
GK21sokss_pu:21219: ity uktvā tena muktaḥ sa haṃso gatvā śaśaṃsa tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21220: damayantyai yathāvastu yathākāmaṃ jagāma ca // SoKss_9,6.255 //
GK21sokss_pu:21221: damayantī ca sotkaṇṭhā yuktyā mātṛmukhena sā /
GK21sokss_pu:21222: pituḥ svātprārthayām āsa nalaprāptyai svayaṃvaram // SoKss_9,6.256 //
GK21sokss_pu:21223: anumanya sa tasyāś ca svayaṃvarakṛte pitā /
GK21sokss_pu:21224: bhīmaḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ dūtānvisṛṣṭavān // SoKss_9,6.257 //
GK21sokss_pu:21225: prāptadūtāś ca nikhilā vidarbhān prati bhūmipāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21226: vrajanti sma nalo 'py utko rathārūḍhaś cacāla saḥ // SoKss_9,6.258 //
GK21sokss_pu:21230: saṃmantrya damayanty uktvā nalasyaivāntikaṃ yayuḥ // SoKss_9,6.260 //
GK21sokss_pu:21231: ūcuś ca prāpya taṃ prahvaṃ vidarbhān prasthitaṃ pathi /
GK21sokss_pu:21232: gatvāsmadvacanād brūhi damayantīm idaṃ nṛpa // SoKss_9,6.261 //
GK21sokss_pu:21233: pañcānāṃ varayaikaṃ naḥ kiṃ martyena nalena te /
GK21sokss_pu:21236: tathetyetāṃ ca devājñāṃ pratipede nalo 'tha saḥ // SoKss_9,6.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:21237: gatvā cāntaḥpuraṃ tasyāḥ praviśyādṛṣṭa eva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:21238: damayantyāḥ śaśaṃsaiva devādeśaṃ tathaiva tam // SoKss_9,6.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:21239: sā taṃ śrutvābravītsādhvī devāste santu tādṛśāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21240: tathāpi me nalo bhartā na kāryaṃ tridaśair mama // SoKss_9,6.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:21242: nalo gatvā tathaivaitadindrādibhyaḥ śaśaṃsa saḥ // SoKss_9,6.266 //
GK21sokss_pu:21244: tathyavādinniti ca te tuṣṭāstasmai dudurvarān // SoKss_9,6.267 //
GK21sokss_pu:21248: svayaṃvare prastute te nalāntika upāviśan // SoKss_9,6.269 //
GK21sokss_pu:21249: athaitya damayantī sā bhrātrā svenaikaśo nṛpān /
GK21sokss_pu:21252: sā bhrātari samudbhrānte vyākulā samacintayat // SoKss_9,6.271 //
GK21sokss_pu:21253: nūnaṃ me lokapālaistair māyeyaṃ pañcabhiḥ kṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:21254: ṣaṣṭhaṃ manye nalaṃ tvatra na cānyatrāsti me gatiḥ // SoKss_9,6.272 //
GK21sokss_pu:21257: bho lokapālāḥ svapne 'pi nalādanyatra cenna me /
GK21sokss_pu:21258: manastattena satyena svaṃ darśayata me vapuḥ // SoKss_9,6.274 //
GK21sokss_pu:21260: paradārāś ca sā teṣāṃ tatkathaṃ moha eṣa vaḥ // SoKss_9,6.275 //
GK21sokss_pu:21264: dṛśaṃ varaṇamālāṃ ca hṛṣṭā rājñi nale nyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.277 //
GK21sokss_pu:21266: vivāhamaṅgalaṃ bhīmaścakre tasya nalasya ca // SoKss_9,6.278 //
GK21sokss_pu:21268: nṛpā yathāgataṃ jagmurdevāḥ śakrādayaś ca te // SoKss_9,6.279 //
GK21sokss_pu:21270: buddhvā ca damayantyarthamāgatau tau ca te 'bruvan // SoKss_9,6.280 //
GK21sokss_pu:21271: na gantavyaṃ vidarbheṣu tata evāgatā vayam /
GK21sokss_pu:21272: vṛttaḥ svayaṃvaro rājā damayantyā nalo vṛtaḥ // SoKss_9,6.281 //
GK21sokss_pu:21273: tac chrutvaivocatuḥ pāpau tau kalidvāparau ruṣā /
GK21sokss_pu:21274: devān bhavādṛśāṃs tyaktvā yat sa martyo vṛtas tayā // SoKss_9,6.282 //
GK21sokss_pu:21276: evaṃ kṛtapratijñau tau nivartya yayatus tataḥ // SoKss_9,6.283 //
GK21sokss_pu:21278: damayantyā samaṃ vadhvā kṛtārtho niṣadhānagāt // SoKss_9,6.284 //
GK21sokss_pu:21280: śarvasya gaurī dehārdhaṃ tasya tvātmaiva sābhavat // SoKss_9,6.285 //
GK21sokss_pu:21282: prasūte sma tadanvekāmindrasenāṃ ca kanyakām // SoKss_9,6.286 //
GK21sokss_pu:21283: tāvac ca sa kaliś chidraṃ tasyānucchāstravartinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21286: sa suṣvāpa nalaḥ pānamadena muṣitasmṛtiḥ // SoKss_9,6.288 //
GK21sokss_pu:21288: kalis tasya śarīrāntarnalasya praviveśa saḥ // SoKss_9,6.289 //
GK21sokss_pu:21289: tena dehapraviṣṭena kalinā sa nalo nṛpaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21292: asevata divā svapnaṃ sa jajāgara rātriṣu // SoKss_9,6.291 //
GK21sokss_pu:21294: avamānaṃ satāṃ cakre saṃmānamasatāṃ ca saḥ // SoKss_9,6.292 //
GK21sokss_pu:21296: chidraṃ prāpya śarīrāntaḥpraviṣṭo dvāparo vyadhāt // SoKss_9,6.293 //
GK21sokss_pu:21297: kadācit puṣkarākhyas ya gṛhe tasyānujasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21298: nalo dadarśa dāntākhyaṃ sundaraṃ dhavalaṃ vṛṣam // SoKss_9,6.294 //
GK21sokss_pu:21299: lobhānmṛgayamānāya taṃ tasmai jyāyase na saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21301: jagāda taṃ ca yadyasti vāñchāsminvṛṣabhe tava /
GK21sokss_pu:21302: taddyūtena vijityainaṃ mattaḥ svīkuru mā ciram // SoKss_9,6.296 //
GK21sokss_pu:21303: tac chrutvā sa nalo mohātpratipede tatheti tat /
GK21sokss_pu:21304: tataḥ pravavṛte dyūtaṃ tayor bhātroḥ parasparam // SoKss_9,6.297 //
GK21sokss_pu:21305: puṣkarākhyas ya sa vṛṣo nalasyebhādayaḥ paṇaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21306: jigāya puṣkarākhyaś ca nalo muhurajīyata // SoKss_9,6.298 //
GK21sokss_pu:21307: dinair dvitrair bale koṣe hārite 'pi durodarāt /
GK21sokss_pu:21308: na nalo vāryamāṇo 'pi cacāla kaliviplutaḥ // SoKss_9,6.299 //
GK21sokss_pu:21309: tena matvā gataṃ rājyaṃ damayantī nijau śiśū /
GK21sokss_pu:21312: tataḥ sa puṣkarākhyena jagade jitakāśinā // SoKss_9,6.301 //
GK21sokss_pu:21314: damayantīmidānīṃ tvaṃ dyūte pratipaṇaṃ kuru // SoKss_9,6.302 //
GK21sokss_pu:21315: ity uktivātyayā tasya nalo 'nala iva jvalan /
GK21sokss_pu:21316: na cākāle 'bravītkiṃcinna ca cakre paṇakriyām // SoKss_9,6.303 //
GK21sokss_pu:21317: tataḥ sa puṣkarākhyas tamavādīnna karoṣi cet /
GK21sokss_pu:21318: bhāryāṃ paṇaṃ tadasmānme deśānniryāhi tatsakhaḥ // SoKss_9,6.304 //
GK21sokss_pu:21319: tac chrutvaiva nalo deśāddamayantyā samaṃ tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21322: tatrocyatāṃ kimanyeṣāṃ krimīṇām iva dehinām // SoKss_9,6.306 //
GK21sokss_pu:21325: atha bhrātṛhṛtaiśvaryo videśaṃ sa nalo brajan /
GK21sokss_pu:21326: damayantyā saha prāpa kṣudhāklānto vanāntaram // SoKss_9,6.308 //
GK21sokss_pu:21328: sa viśrāntaḥ sarastīre haṃsau dvāvaikṣatāgatau // SoKss_9,6.309 //
GK21sokss_pu:21330: cikṣepa tac ca hṛtvaiva haṃsau tau tasya jagmatuḥ // SoKss_9,6.310 //
GK21sokss_pu:21332: hṛtvā gatāviti nalaḥ sa vācaṃ cāśṛṇoddivaḥ // SoKss_9,6.311 //
GK21sokss_pu:21334: panthānaṃ darśayām āsa damayantyāḥ pitur gṛhe // SoKss_9,6.312 //
GK21sokss_pu:21335: ayaṃ mārgo vidarbheṣu priye pitṛgṛhe iva /
GK21sokss_pu:21338: tyakṣyannivārya putro me mārgaṃ kiṃ vakty asāv iti // SoKss_9,6.314 //
GK21sokss_pu:21339: tatas tau phalamūlānnau vane tatra niśāgame /
GK21sokss_pu:21340: śrāntau saṃviśataḥ smobhau daṃpatī kuśasaṃstare // SoKss_9,6.315 //
GK21sokss_pu:21343: utthāya caikavastrāṃ tāṃ damayantīṃ vimucya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21344: chinnaṃ taduttarīyārdhaṃ prāvṛtya ca tato yayau // SoKss_9,6.317 //
GK21sokss_pu:21345: damayantī ca rātryante prabuddhā taṃ patiṃ vane /
GK21sokss_pu:21346: apaśyantī gataṃ tyaktvā vilalāpa vicintya sā // SoKss_9,6.318 //
GK21sokss_pu:21348: hā madvatsala kenāsi mayi niṣkaruṇīkṛtaḥ // SoKss_9,6.319 //
GK21sokss_pu:21350: kas te śramāpanodāya paricaryāṃ kariṣyati // SoKss_9,6.320 //
GK21sokss_pu:21352: tau te pati kathaṃ pādau dhūliḥ kaluṣayiṣyati // SoKss_9,6.321 //
GK21sokss_pu:21354: aṅgaṃ sahiṣyate tatte madhyāhnārkātapaṃ katham // SoKss_9,6.322 //
GK21sokss_pu:21355: kiṃ me bālena putreṇa kiṃ duhitrā kimātmanā /
GK21sokss_pu:21356: tavaikasya śivaṃ devāḥ kurvatāṃ yadyahaṃ satī // SoKss_9,6.323 //
GK21sokss_pu:21358: tatpūrvadarśitenaiva pratasthe sā tataḥ pathā // SoKss_9,6.324 //
GK21sokss_pu:21360: nāticakrāma bhaktiṃ tu sā bhartari kathaṃcana // SoKss_9,6.325 //
GK21sokss_pu:21364: saha gatvā puraṃ prāpa subāhvākhyasya bhūpateḥ // SoKss_9,6.327 //
GK21sokss_pu:21367: tasyāḥ pārśve mahādevyāḥ sā tasthau ca tadādṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:21368: tyaktvā gato māṃ bharteti pṛṣṭā caitāvadabravīt // SoKss_9,6.329 //
GK21sokss_pu:21369: tāvac ca tatpitā bhīmo nalodantamavetya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:21372: subāho rājadhānīṃ tāṃ prāpa brāhmaṇarūpabhṛt // SoKss_9,6.331 //
GK21sokss_pu:21375: anyonyaṃ pratyabhijñāya sametya rudataḥ sma tau /
GK21sokss_pu:21376: tathā yathātra rājñī sā subāhostadabudhyata // SoKss_9,6.333 //
GK21sokss_pu:21377: yāvac cānāyya sā devī tau yathāvastu pṛcchati /
GK21sokss_pu:21378: bubudhe damayantīm tāṃ tāvat svabhaginīsutām // SoKss_9,6.334 //
GK21sokss_pu:21379: tataḥ sā bharturāvedya tāṃ saṃmānya pitur gṛham /
GK21sokss_pu:21382: pitrāpi dṛśyamānā sā bharturvārtāṃ vicinvatī // SoKss_9,6.336 //
GK21sokss_pu:21385: bālāṃ vane prasuptāṃ nṛśaṃsa saṃtyajya kumudinīkāntām /
GK21sokss_pu:21387: evaṃ bhavadbhir vaktavyaṃ sthitaḥ śaṅkyeta yatra saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:21388: ityādideśa cārāṃstānsa ca bhīmo mahīpatiḥ // SoKss_9,6.339 //

GK21sokss_pu:22734: tato bakas tān ekaikaṃ matsyān nitvā śilātale /

GK21sokss_pu:22737: eko bakaṃ taṃ papraccha nayasi kva timīniti // SoKss_10,4.85 //
GK21sokss_pu:22738: tatas taṃ sa tadevāha bako matsyānuvāca yat /
GK21sokss_pu:22739: tena bhīto jhaṣo 'vocatsa mām apinayeti tam // SoKss_10,4.86 //
GK21sokss_pu:22743: taṃ budhyate sma makaro bakaṃ viśvāsya bhakṣakam // SoKss_10,4.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:22746: gatvā ca śeṣamatsyānāṃ yathāvatsa śaśaṃsa tat /
GK21sokss_pu:22747: te cāpy abhinanandustaṃ tuṣṭāḥ prāṇapradāyinam // SoKss_10,4.90 //
GK21sokss_pu:22748: prajñā nāma balaṃ tasmānniṣprajñasya balena kim /
GK21sokss_pu:22749: etāṃ ca siṃhāśaśayoḥ kathāmatrāparāṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_10,4.91 //
GK21sokss_pu:22751: sa ca yaṃ yaṃ dadarśātra sattvaṃ taṃ taṃ nyapātayat // SoKss_10,4.92 //
GK21sokss_pu:22753: āhārāya tavaikaikaṃ preṣayāmo dine dine // SoKss_10,4.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:22754: sarvān no yugapaddhatvā svārthahāniṃ karoṣi kim /
GK21sokss_pu:22755: iti tadvacanaṃ siṃhaḥ sa tathety anvamanyata // SoKss_10,4.94 //
GK21sokss_pu:22758: sa sarvaiḥ preṣito gacchañ śaśo dhīmān acintayat /
GK21sokss_pu:22759: sa dhīro yo na saṃmoham āpatkāle 'pi gacchati // SoKss_10,4.96 //
GK21sokss_pu:22761: ityālocya sa taṃ siṃhaṃ vilambya śaśako 'bhyagāt // SoKss_10,4.97 //
GK21sokss_pu:22762: āgataṃ tu vilambena kesarī nijagāda saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22763: are velā vyatikrāntā mamāhāre kathaṃ tvayā // SoKss_10,4.98 //
GK21sokss_pu:22764: vadhādapyadhikaṃ kiṃ vā kartavyaṃ te mayā śaṭha /
GK21sokss_pu:22765: ity uktavantaṃ taṃ siṃhaṃ prahvaḥ sa śaśako 'bravīt // SoKss_10,4.99 //
GK21sokss_pu:22766: na me devāparādho 'yaṃ svavaśo nāhamadya yat /
GK21sokss_pu:22769: so 'bravītko dvitīyo 'sau siṃho me darśyatāṃ tvayā // SoKss_10,4.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:22770: āgatya dṛśyatāṃ devety uktvā so 'pi nināya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:22771: tathety anvāgataṃ siṃhaṃ dūraṃ kūpāntikaṃ śaśaḥ // SoKss_10,4.102 //
GK21sokss_pu:22772: ihāntaḥsthaṃ sthitaṃ paśyety uktas tatra ca tena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22774: dṛṣṭvā svacche ca toye svaṃ pratibimbaṃ niśamya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:22779: mṛgān gatvā tad ākhyāya svavṛttaṃ tān anandayat // SoKss_10,4.106 //
GK21sokss_pu:22780: evaṃ prajñaiva paramaṃ balaṃ na tu parākramaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22786: pṛṣṭaś ca kāraṇaṃ tena tam uvāca janāntikam /
GK21sokss_pu:22787: buddhvā na yujyate tūṣṇīṃ sthātuṃ deva vadāmyataḥ // SoKss_10,4.110 //
GK21sokss_pu:22790: vṛṣaḥ saṃjīvako 'yaṃ tvāṃ hatvā rājyaṃ cikīrṣati /
GK21sokss_pu:22791: mantriṇā hi satānena tvaṃ bhīruriti niścitaḥ // SoKss_10,4.112 //
GK21sokss_pu:22792: dhunoti tvāṃ jighāṃsuś ca śṛṅgayugmaṃ nijāyudham /
GK21sokss_pu:22793: nirbhayā jīvatha sukhaṃ mayi rājñi tṛṇāśane // SoKss_10,4.113 //
GK21sokss_pu:22795: āśvāsyopajapatyevaṃ prāṇinaś ca vane vane // SoKss_10,4.114 //
GK21sokss_pu:22796: tadetaṃ cintaya vṛṣaṃ nāstyasminsati śarma te /
GK21sokss_pu:22797: evaṃ damanakenoktaḥ sa taṃ piṅgalako 'bhyadhāt // SoKss_10,4.115 //
GK21sokss_pu:22799: dattābhayaṃ kathaṃ hanyāmenaṃ ca śaraṇāgatam // SoKss_10,4.116 //
GK21sokss_pu:22800: etac chrutvā damanakaḥ prāha mā smaivamādiśa /
GK21sokss_pu:22801: yastulyaḥ kriyate rājñā na tadvacchrīḥ prasarpati // SoKss_10,4.117 //
GK21sokss_pu:22802: dvayor dattapadā sā ca tayor ucchritayoścalā /
GK21sokss_pu:22803: na śaknoti ciraṃ sthātuṃ dhruvamekaṃ vimuñcati // SoKss_10,4.118 //
GK21sokss_pu:22804: prabhuś ca yo hitaṃ dveṣṭi sevate cāhitaṃ sadā /
GK21sokss_pu:22805: sa varjanīyo vidvadbhir vaidyair duṣṭāturo yathā // SoKss_10,4.119 //
GK21sokss_pu:22807: vaktā śrotā ca yatra syāttatra śrīḥ kurute padam // SoKss_10,4.120 //
GK21sokss_pu:22808: na śṛṇoti satāṃ mantram asatāṃ ca śṛṇoti yaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22809: acireṇa sa saṃprāpyaḥ vipadaṃ paritapyate // SoKss_10,4.121 //
GK21sokss_pu:22810: tad asmin ukṣṇi kaḥ snehas tava deva kim asya vā /
GK21sokss_pu:22811: druhyato 'bhayadānaṃ ca śaraṇāgatatā ca kā // SoKss_10,4.122 //
GK21sokss_pu:22813: deva kītāḥ prajāyante te tanmūtrapurīṣayoḥ // SoKss_10,4.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:22815: śarīre bhavataḥ kiṃ na vṛttaḥ syād yuktito vadhaḥ // SoKss_10,4.124 //
GK21sokss_pu:22816: durjanaś cet svayaṃ dosaṃ vipaścin na karoti tat /
GK21sokss_pu:22817: utpatsyate sa tatsaṅgād atra ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // SoKss_10,4.125 //
GK21sokss_pu:22821: viveśa śayanīyaṃ tat ṭiṭṭibho nāma matkuṇaḥ // SoKss_10,4.127 //
GK21sokss_pu:22823: iti mandavisarpiṇyā sa dṛṣṭvā jagade tayā // SoKss_10,4.128 //
GK21sokss_pu:22825: dehīha vastum iti tām avādīt so 'pi ṭiṭṭibhaḥ // SoKss_10,4.129 //
GK21sokss_pu:22826: tato 'nurodhād āha sma sā taṃ yady evam āssva tat /
GK21sokss_pu:22827: kiṃ tvasya rājño nākāle daṃśo deyas tvayā sakhe // SoKss_10,4.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:22828: deyo 'sya daṃśaḥ suptasya ratiśaktasya vā laghu /
GK21sokss_pu:22829: tac chrutvā ṭiṭṭibhaḥ so 'tra tathety uktvā vyatiṣṭhata // SoKss_10,4.131
GK21sokss_pu:22830: naktaṃ śayyāsthitaṃ taṃ ca nṛpamāśu dadaṃśa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22831: uttasthau ca tato rājā hā daṣṭo 'smīti sa bruvan // SoKss_10,4.132 //
GK21sokss_pu:22833: vicintya rājabhṛtyaiḥ sa labdhā yuktā vyapātyata // SoKss_10,4.133 //
GK21sokss_pu:22835: tatsaṃjīvakasaṃghas te na śivasya bhaviṣyati // SoKss_10,4.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:22836: na me pratyeṣi cettattvaṃ svayaṃ drakṣyasyupāgatam /
GK21sokss_pu:22837: śiro dhunānaṃ darpeṇa śṛṅgayoḥ śūlaśātayoḥ // SoKss_10,4.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:22838: ity uktvā vikṛtiṃ tena nīto damanakena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22839: siṃhaḥ piṅgalakaścakre vadhyaṃ saṃjīvakaṃ hṛdi // SoKss_10,4.136 //
GK21sokss_pu:22840: labdhvā tasyāśayaṃ svair aṃ kṣaṇāddamanakas tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22841: tasya saṃjīvakasyāgāt sa viṣaṇṇa ivāntikam // SoKss_10,4.137 //
GK21sokss_pu:22842: kimīdṛgasi kiṃ mitra śarīre kuśalaṃ tava /
GK21sokss_pu:22843: iti pṛṣṭaś ca tenātra vṛṣeṇa sa jagādatam // SoKss_10,4.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:22844: kiṃ sevakasya kuśalaṃ kaś ca rājñāṃ sadā priyaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22845: ko 'rthī na lāghavaṃ yātaḥ kaḥ kālasya na gocaraḥ // SoKss_10,4.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:22846: ity uktavantaṃ papraccha taṃ sa saṃjīvakaḥ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22849: mṛgarājo viruddho 'sau jātaḥ piṅgalako 'dya te // SoKss_10,4.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:22851: hiṃsraṃ paricchadaṃ cāsya paśyāmi prerakaṃ sadā // SoKss_10,4.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:22853: satyaṃ vicintya vṛṣabho vimanā nijagāda tam // SoKss_10,4.143 //
GK21sokss_pu:22855: prabhurvair itvamevaiti tathā cemāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_10,4.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:22861: uṣṭro 'yamiti vakti sma deśadraṣṭātra vāyasaḥ // SoKss_10,4.147 //
GK21sokss_pu:22865: upavāsān bahūṃś cakre svasthais taiḥ sahito 'nugaiḥ // SoKss_10,4.149 //
GK21sokss_pu:22866: tataḥ klāntaḥ sa bhakṣyārthaṃ bhramansiṃho 'navāpya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:22869: uṣṭreṇa sākaṃ kiṃ sakhyaṃ kiṃ nāsāveva bhakṣyate // SoKss_10,4.151 //
GK21sokss_pu:22871: bahūnāmāmiṣasyārthe kiṃ caikastyajyate na kim // SoKss_10,4.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:22873: dāpayāmaḥ svavācā tadyuktyā tanumamuṃ vayam // SoKss_10,4.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:22874: ity ukte tair anujñātastena siṃhena vāyasaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22875: vadhāya saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā karabhaṃ tam abhāṣata // SoKss_10,4.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:22876: eṣa svāmī kṣudhākrānto 'py asmānvakti na kiṃcana /
GK21sokss_pu:22877: tadasyātmapradānoktyā priyaṃ kurmo yathā vayam // SoKss_10,4.155 //
GK21sokss_pu:22878: tathā tvam apikurvīthā yenāsau prīyate tvayi /
GK21sokss_pu:22880: upāyayau ca taṃ siṃha saha kākena tena saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22881: tataḥ kāko 'bravīddeva svāyattaṃ bhuṅkṣva māmimam // SoKss_10,4.157 //
GK21sokss_pu:22882: kiṃ tvayā svalpakāyenety ukte siṃhena jambukaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22883: māṃ bhuṅkṣvetyavadattaṃ ca sa tathaiva nirākarot // SoKss_10,4.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:22884: dvīpī tam abravīddeva māṃ bhuṅkṣveti tam apy asau /
GK21sokss_pu:22885: nābhuṅkta hariruṣṭro 'tha babhāṣe bhuṅkṣva māmiti // SoKss_10,4.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:22886: vākchalena sa tenaiva hatvā kṛtvā ca khaṇḍaśaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22887: uṣṭras tair bhakṣitaḥ sadyaḥ sasiṃhair vāyasādibhiḥ // SoKss_10,4.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:22890: gṛdhro 'pi hi varaṃ rājā sevyo haṃsaparicchadaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22893: dhair yeṇa sādhyate sarvaṃ śṛṇu vacmyatra te kathām // SoKss_10,4.163 //
GK21sokss_pu:22895: dhṛtagarbhā sati bhāryā ṭiṭṭibhī nijagāda tam // SoKss_10,4.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:22896: ehi kvāpy anyato yāvaḥ prasūtāyā mameha hi /
GK21sokss_pu:22897: hared apatyāny ambhodhiḥ kadācid ayam ūrmibhiḥ // SoKss_10,4.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:22898: etadbhāryāvacaḥ śrutvā ṭiṭṭibhaḥ sa jagāda tām /
GK21sokss_pu:22899: na śaknoti mayā sākaṃ virodhaṃ kartumambudhiḥ // SoKss_10,4.166 //
GK21sokss_pu:22900: tac chrutvā ṭiṭṭibhī prāha maivaṃ kā te tulābdhinā /
GK21sokss_pu:22902: tathā ca kambugrīvākhyaḥ kūrmaḥ kvāpi sarasy abhūt /
GK21sokss_pu:22903: tasyāstāṃ suhṛdau haṃsau nāmnā vikaṭasaṃkaṭau // SoKss_10,4.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:22905: haṃsavanyatsaro gantukāmau kūrmo jagāda saḥ // SoKss_10,4.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:22906: yuvāṃ yatrodyatau gantuṃ nayataṃ tatra māmapi /
GK21sokss_pu:22907: tac chrutvā tāvubhau haṃsau kūrmaṃ taṃ mittramūcatuḥ // SoKss_10,4.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:22910: asmaddhṛtāṃ gṛhītvaiva dantair yaṣṭiṃ divi vrajan /
GK21sokss_pu:22912: tatheti tena dantāttayaṣṭinā saha tau nabhaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22914: kramāc ca tatsarobhyarṇaṃ prāptau tau kūrmahāriṇau /
GK21sokss_pu:22918: kutaḥ kalakalo 'dhastād iti vaktrād vihāya tām /
GK21sokss_pu:22919: yaṣṭiṃ sa pṛcchan haṃsau tau bhraṣṭo jaghne janair bhuvi // SoKss_10,4.176
GK21sokss_pu:22920: evaṃ buddhicyuto naśyet kūrmo yaṣṭicyuto yathā /
GK21sokss_pu:22921: itthaṃ tayoktaṣ ṭiṭṭibhyā ṭiṭṭibhaḥ sa jagāda tām // SoKss_10,4.177 //
GK21sokss_pu:22922: satyam etat priye kiṃ tu tvam apy etāṃ kathāṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:22923: nadyantaḥsthe hṛde 'bhūvan kvāpi matsyāḥ purā trayaḥ // SoKss_10,4.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:22925: tṛtīyo yadbhaviṣyaś ca trayas te sahacāriṇaḥ // SoKss_10,4.179 //
GK21sokss_pu:22926: te dāśānāṃ vaco jātu tena mārgeṇa gacchatām /
GK21sokss_pu:22927: aho asmin hrade matsyāḥ santīti kila śuśruvuḥ // SoKss_10,4.180 //
GK21sokss_pu:22928: tenāśaṅkya vadhaṃ dāśair nadīsrotaḥ praviśya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22933: athāgatyākṣipañjālaṃ tatra me dhīvarā hrade // SoKss_10,4.183 //
GK21sokss_pu:22935: kṛtvā niṣpandamātmānaṃ tiṣṭhati sma mṛto yathā // SoKss_10,4.184 //
GK21sokss_pu:22939: kurvan gṛhītvā nihato mandabuddhiḥ sa dhīvaraiḥ // SoKss_10,4.186 //
GK21sokss_pu:22941: ity uktvā ṭiṭṭibho bhāryāṃ tatraivāsītsvanīḍake // SoKss_10,4.187 //
GK21sokss_pu:22943: divasaiś ca prasūtā sā tadbhāryā tatra ṭiṭṭibhī // SoKss_10,4.188 //
GK21sokss_pu:22945: paśyāmi ṭiṭṭibho 'yaṃ me kiṃ kuryāditi kautukān // SoKss_10,4.189 //
GK21sokss_pu:22947: ityāha rudatī sā taṃ ṭiṭṭibhī ṭiṭṭibhaṃ patim // SoKss_10,4.190 //
GK21sokss_pu:22948: tataḥ sa ṭiṭṭibho dhīrastāṃ svabhāryām abhāṣata /
GK21sokss_pu:22949: paśyeha kiṃ karomyasya pāpasya jaladheraham // SoKss_10,4.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:22951: gatvā taiḥ saha cakranda śaraṇaṃ garuḍaṃ prabhum // SoKss_10,4.192 //
GK21sokss_pu:22953: anāthavatparābhūtā ityūcustaṃ ca te khagāḥ // SoKss_10,4.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:22956: tasmād atyaktadhair yeṇa bhāvyam āpadi dhīmatā /
GK21sokss_pu:22957: upasthitam idānīm tu yuddhaṃ piṅgalakena te // SoKss_10,4.195 //
GK21sokss_pu:22959: utthāsyati sa te vidyāḥ prajihīrṣuṃ tadaiva tam // SoKss_10,4.196 //
GK21sokss_pu:22960: sajjo nataśirā bhūtvā śṛṅgābhyām udare ca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:22962: evam uktvā damanakaḥ saṃjīvakavṛṣaṃ sa tam /
GK21sokss_pu:22963: gatvā karaṭakāyobhau siddhabhedau śaśaṃsa tau // SoKss_10,4.198 //
GK21sokss_pu:22969: vṛṣo 'pi tasmiñ śṛṅgābhyaṃ prāvartiṣṭāhavas tayoḥ // SoKss_10,4.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:22970: tac ca dṛṣṭvā damanakaṃ sādhuḥ karaṭako 'bravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:22971: kiṃ svārthasiddhyai vyasanaṃ prabhorutpāditaṃ tvayā // SoKss_10,4.202 //
GK21sokss_pu:22973: pāruṣyeṇāhṛtā mittra na cirasthāyinī bhavet // SoKss_10,4.203 //
GK21sokss_pu:22974: alaṃ vā yo bahu brūte hitavākyāvamāninaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22975: sa tasmāllabhate doṣaṃ kapeḥ sūcīmukho yathā // SoKss_10,4.204 //
GK21sokss_pu:22977: te śīte jātu khadyotaṃ dṛṣṭvāgniriti menire // SoKss_10,4.205 //
GK21sokss_pu:22980: taddṛṣṭvā tatra taṃ prāha pakṣī sūcimukhābhidhaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22982: tac chrutvāpy anivṛttaṃ taṃ pakṣī so 'bhyetya vṛkṣataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:22983: nyavārayad yan nirbandhāt kapis tena cukopa saḥ // SoKss_10,4.208 //
GK21sokss_pu:22984: kṣiptayā śilayā taṃ ca sūcīmukham acūrṇayat /
GK21sokss_pu:22985: tasmān na tasya vaktavyaṃ yaḥ kuryān na hitaṃ vacaḥ // SoKss_10,4.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:22987: duṣṭayā kriyate yac ca buddhyā tan na śubhaṃ bhavet // SoKss_10,4.210 //
GK21sokss_pu:22988: tathā cābhavatāṃ pūrvaṃ bhrātarau dvau vaṇiksutau /
GK21sokss_pu:22989: dharmabuddhis tathā duṣṭabuddhiḥ kvacana pattane // SoKss_10,4.211 //
GK21sokss_pu:22992: tad gṛhītvā svanagaraṃ punar ājagmatuś ca tau /
GK21sokss_pu:22993: vṛkṣamūle ca dīnārān bhūtale tān nicakhnatuḥ // SoKss_10,4.213 //
GK21sokss_pu:22994: śatamekaṃ gṛhītvā ca dīnārāṇāṃ vibhajya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:22998: māsamātre gate taṃ ca dharmabuddhim uvāca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23000: tac chrutva dharmabuddhistāṃ gatvā bhūmiṃ tatheti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23001: cakhāna tenaiva samaṃ dīnārānyatra tānnyadhāt // SoKss_10,4.217 //
GK21sokss_pu:23002: saṃprāptā na yadā te ca dīnārāḥ svātakāttataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23003: tadā sa duṣṭabuddhistaṃ dharmabuddhiṃ śaṭho 'bravīt // SoKss_10,4.218 //

GK21sokss_pu:23339: sa yāti tāvad duṣṭvaitad dīrghadṛśvākhuvākyataḥ // SoKss_10,5.131 //
GK21sokss_pu:23340: mṛgo gatvā tato dūre patitvāsīnmṛto yathā /
GK21sokss_pu:23342: taddṛṣṭvā sa gṛhītaṃ taṃ vyādho matvā mṛgaṃ mṛtam /
GK21sokss_pu:23343: gantuṃ pravavṛte nadyāstaṭe kūrmaṃ nidhāya tam // SoKss_10,5.133 //
GK21sokss_pu:23344: yātaṃ dṛṣṭvā tamabhyetya mūṣakas tasya jālikām /
GK21sokss_pu:23345: kūrmasya so 'cchinattena mukto nadyāṃ papāta saḥ // SoKss_10,5.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:23350: tato milanti smaikatra hṛṣṭāḥ kūrmādayo 'tra te /
GK21sokss_pu:23354: evaṃ praśaṃsatā tena mṛgeṇa saha tatra te /
GK21sokss_pu:23357: prāṇair api na muñcanti te 'pyevaṃ mittramāpadi // SoKss_10,5.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:23358: evaṃ ca śreyasī mittreṣv āsaktir nāṅganāsu tām /
GK21sokss_pu:23359: īrṣyāśrayatvāc chaṃsanti tathā ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // SoKss_10,5.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:23360: nagare kvāpi ko 'py āsīd īrṣyāvān puruṣaḥ prabho /
GK21sokss_pu:23361: babhūva tasya bhāryā ca vallabhā rūpaśālinī // SoKss_10,5.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:23362: aviśvasto na tāṃ jātu mumocaikākinīṃ ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23363: tasyā hi śīlavibhraṃśaṃ citrasthebhyo 'py aśaṅkata // SoKss_10,5.143 //
GK21sokss_pu:23365: sahaivādāya tāṃ bhāryāṃ pratasthe viṣayāntaram // SoKss_10,5.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:23367: sthāpayitvā gṛhe grāmyavṛddhaviprasya tāṃ yayau // SoKss_10,5.145 //
GK21sokss_pu:23368: tatra sthitā ca sā dṛṣṭā bhillāṃs tenāgatān pathā /
GK21sokss_pu:23369: ekena yūnā bhillena saha dhṛṣṭā yayau tataḥ // SoKss_10,5.146 //
GK21sokss_pu:23370: tena yuktā ca tatpallīṃ yathākāmaṃ cacāra sā /
GK21sokss_pu:23372: tāvat sa tatpatiḥ kṛtvā kāryamāgatya taṃ dvijam /
GK21sokss_pu:23373: grāmyaṃ yayāce tāṃ bhāryāṃ so 'pi vipro jagāda tam // SoKss_10,5.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:23374: na jāne 'haṃ kva yātā sā jānāmyetāvadeva tu /
GK21sokss_pu:23375: bhillā ihāgatā āsaṃstaiḥ sa nītā bhaviṣyati // SoKss_10,5.149 //
GK21sokss_pu:23376: sā pallī nikaṭe ceha tattatra vraja satvaram /
GK21sokss_pu:23377: tataḥ prāpsyasi tāṃ bhāryāmanyathā mā matiṃ kṛthāḥ // SoKss_10,5.150 //
GK21sokss_pu:23378: ity uktas tena sa rudan nindan buddhiviparyayam /
GK21sokss_pu:23379: jagāma bhillapallīṃ tāṃ bhāryāṃ tatra dadarśa ca // SoKss_10,5.151 //
GK21sokss_pu:23380: sāpi dṛṣṭvā tamabhyetya pāpā bhītā tadābravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:23381: na me doṣo 'hamānītā bhilleneha balāditi // SoKss_10,5.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:23383: iti bruvāṇaṃ rāgāndhaṃ tam uvāca patiṃ ca sā // SoKss_10,5.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:23385: āgataścānudhāvyaiva hanyāttvāṃ māṃ ca sa dhruvam // SoKss_10,5.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:23387: rātrau ca suptaṃ hatvā taṃ yāsyāvo nirbhayāvitaḥ // SoKss_10,5.155 //
GK21sokss_pu:23388: evaṃ tayoktaḥ śaṭhayā praviśyāsīdguhāṃ sa tām /
GK21sokss_pu:23392: sa ca niṣkṛṣya taṃ bhillaḥ krūrakarmā parākramī /
GK21sokss_pu:23394: bhuktvā ca paśyatas tasya rātrau tadbhāryayā saha /
GK21sokss_pu:23395: sa samāsevya surataṃ sukhaṃ suṣvāpa tadyutaḥ // SoKss_10,5.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:23397: caṇḍīṃ stutibhir abhyarcya yayau śaraṇamārtitaḥ // SoKss_10,5.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:23398: sāvirbhūya varaṃ tasmai taṃ dadau yena tasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23400: ehīdānīṃ hataḥ pāpo mayāyamiti so 'tha tām /
GK21sokss_pu:23401: prabodhya bhāryāṃ vakti sma sāpy uttasthau suduḥkhitā // SoKss_10,5.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:23402: gṛhītvā tasya ca śiro bhillasyālakṣitaṃ niśi /
GK21sokss_pu:23403: tataḥ pratasthe kustrī sa patyā tena sahaiva ca // SoKss_10,5.163 //
GK21sokss_pu:23404: prātaś ca nagaraṃ prāpya darśayantī śiro 'tra tat /
GK21sokss_pu:23405: bhartā hato me 'neneti cakrandākramya taṃ patim // SoKss_10,5.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:23406: tataḥ sa nītas tadyukto rājāgre purarakṣibhiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23407: pṛṣṭas tatra yathāvṛttam īrṣyālus tad avarṇayat // SoKss_10,5.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:23409: tasyāḥ karṇau ca nāsāṃ ca tatpatiṃ ca mumoca tam // SoKss_10,5.166 //
GK21sokss_pu:23411: evaṃ hi kurute deva yoṣidīrṣyāniyantritā // SoKss_10,5.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:23414: rahasyaṃ ca na vaktavyaṃ vanitāsu yathā tathā /
GK21sokss_pu:23415: puruṣeṇecchatā kṣemamatra ca śrūyatāṃ kathā // SoKss_10,5.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:23419: svaprabhāvāc ca tattasyai sa nāgaḥ pratyahaṃ dadau // SoKss_10,5.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:23420: kuto 'nvahamiyantas te hastino brūhi ko bhavān /
GK21sokss_pu:23421: iti nirbandhataḥ sātha taṃ papraccha vilāsinī // SoKss_10,5.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:23423: nāgo 'hamiti vakti sma so 'pi tāṃ māramohitaḥ // SoKss_10,5.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:23424: sā tadrahasi kuṭṭanyai śaśaṃsa gaṇikā tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23426: upetya kuṭṭanīṃ tāṃ ca jagāda tvatsutāgṛhe /
GK21sokss_pu:23429: tatkimekāhabhāṭyeti kuṭṭany api jagāda tam // SoKss_10,5.176 //
GK21sokss_pu:23430: tataḥ sa garuḍo nāgaṃ tatra sthitamavetya tam /
GK21sokss_pu:23433: prakāśyātmānamutplutya jaghāna ca jaghāsa ca // SoKss_10,5.178 //
GK21sokss_pu:23435: ity uktvā gomukho mugdhakathāṃ punaravarṇayat // SoKss_10,5.179 //
GK21sokss_pu:23437: sa ca mūrkho 'rthavāṃlloke lajjate sma kacair vinā // SoKss_10,5.180 //
GK21sokss_pu:23439: eko 'sti vaidyo yo vetti keśotpādanamauṣadham // SoKss_10,5.181 //
GK21sokss_pu:23440: etac chrutvā tamāha sma tamāsnayasi cenmama /
GK21sokss_pu:23441: tato 'haṃ tava dāsyāmi dhanaṃ vaidyasya tasya ca // SoKss_10,5.182 //
GK21sokss_pu:23442: evam uktavatas tasya dhanaṃ bhuktvācireṇa saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23444: upajīvya ciraṃ so 'pi khalvāṭaṃ taṃ bhiṣakchiraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23445: apāsya veṣṭanaṃ yuktvā mugdhāyāsmāy adarśayat // SoKss_10,5.184 //
GK21sokss_pu:23447: taṃ yayāce sa jaḍadhīstato vaidyo 'bravītsa tam // SoKss_10,5.185 //
GK21sokss_pu:23449: iti te mūrkha nirloma darśitaṃ svaśiro mayā // SoKss_10,5.186 //
GK21sokss_pu:23450: tathāpi tvaṃ na vetsyeva dhigity uktvā yayau bhiṣak /
GK21sokss_pu:23451: evaṃ deva sadā dhūrtāḥ krīḍanti jaḍabuddhibhiḥ // SoKss_10,5.187 //
GK21sokss_pu:23455: preṣito jātu tattasmātpātre tailam upādade // SoKss_10,5.189 //
GK21sokss_pu:23457: ūce mittreṇa rakṣedaṃ tailapātraṃ sravatyadhaḥ // SoKss_10,5.190 //
GK21sokss_pu:23459: sa mūḍhastena tatsarvaṃ tailaṃ tasyāpatadbhuvi // SoKss_10,5.191 //
GK21sokss_pu:23461: tasmāt svabuddhir mugdhasya varaṃ na tvanuśāsanam // SoKss_10,5.192 //
GK21sokss_pu:23463: abhūn mūrkhaḥ pumān kaścid bhāryābhūt tasya cāsatī // SoKss_10,5.193 //
GK21sokss_pu:23469: karmakaryavadadbharyā mṛtā dagdhā ca sā tava // SoKss_10,5.196 //
GK21sokss_pu:23470: ity uktvā sā śmaśānaṃ ca nītvā tasmāyadarśayast /
GK21sokss_pu:23471: asthīny anyacitāsthāni tāny ādāya rudaṃś ca saḥ // SoKss_10,5.197 //
GK21sokss_pu:23473: prāvartata sa bhāryāyāstasyāḥ śrāddhavidhau jaḍaḥ // SoKss_10,5.198 //
GK21sokss_pu:23474: sadvipra ity upānītaṃ karmakaryā tayaiva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:23475: tam eva bhāryopapatiṃ śrāddhavipraṃ cakāra saḥ // SoKss_10,5.199 //
GK21sokss_pu:23477: udāraveṣā bhuṅkte sma mṛṣṭānnaṃ māsi māsi tat // SoKss_10,5.200 //
GK21sokss_pu:23479: paśyāgatya svayaṃ bhuṅkte brāhmaṇena samaṃ prabho // SoKss_10,5.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:23488: tāvadāgātpathā tena munis tasya praṇamya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23489: pādau gajāvarūḍhaḥ sanrājā svabhavanaṃ yayau // SoKss_10,5.206 //
GK21sokss_pu:23491: caṇḍālakanyā rājānaṃ tyaktvā sā munimanvagāt // SoKss_10,5.207 //
GK21sokss_pu:23493: nyastajānuḥ kṣitau tatra śivaṃ natvā yayau tataḥ // SoKss_10,5.208 //
GK21sokss_pu:23495: bhartṛbuddhyā muniṃ tyaktvā devaṃ tatraiva śiśriye // SoKss_10,5.209 //
GK21sokss_pu:23499: yāntaṃ tam evānvagāt sā tyaktvā devaṃ patīcchayā // SoKss_10,5.211 //
GK21sokss_pu:23503: svajātituṣṭā vavre sā tam eva patimantyajā // SoKss_10,5.213 //
GK21sokss_pu:23504: evaṃ kṛtapadā dūre patanti svapade jaḍāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23505: evaṃ ca mūrkhaṃ rājānaṃ saṃkṣepādaparaṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_10,5.214 //
GK21sokss_pu:23509: tad dehi dānam āyūṃṣi bhaṅgurāṇi dhanāni ca // SoKss_10,5.216 //
GK21sokss_pu:23511: durgatiṃ prāptamātmānaṃ mṛto drakṣyāmi cediti // SoKss_10,5.217 //
GK21sokss_pu:23513: evaṃ nojjhati mūḍho 'rthānyāvadarthaiḥ sa nojjhitaḥ // SoKss_10,5.218 //
GK21sokss_pu:23514: rājabhautaḥ śruto deva madhye mittradvayaṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:23517: bahir bhuktvā ca pītvā ca sadaiva prāviśadgṛham // SoKss_10,5.220 //
GK21sokss_pu:23519: pṛṣṭaḥ sa jātu dhavalamukhastāmevam abhyadhāt // SoKss_10,5.221 //
GK21sokss_pu:23521: sadaivāyāmi yenāsti loke mittradvayaṃ mama // SoKss_10,5.222 //
GK21sokss_pu:23523: dvitīyo vīrabāhuś ca prāṇair apy upakārakaḥ // SoKss_10,5.223 //
GK21sokss_pu:23525: ūce mittradvayaṃ tanme bhavatā darśyatāmiti // SoKss_10,5.224 //
GK21sokss_pu:23526: tato yayau sa tadyuktas tasya kalyāṇavarmaṇaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23527: gṛhaṃ so 'pi mahārhaistam upacārair upācarat // SoKss_10,5.225 //
GK21sokss_pu:23529: sa ca dyūtasthitaḥ kṛtvā svāgataṃ taṃ visṛṣṭavān // SoKss_10,5.226 //
GK21sokss_pu:23531: kalyāṇavarmā mahatīṃ satkriyām akarot tava // SoKss_10,5.227 //
GK21sokss_pu:23533: tadāryaputra taṃ mittraṃ manyase 'bhyadhikaṃ katham // SoKss_10,5.228 //
GK21sokss_pu:23534: tac chrutvā so 'bravīdgaccha mithyā tau brūhyubhau kramāt /
GK21sokss_pu:23535: rājā naḥ kupito 'kasmāttato jñāsyasyatha svayam // SoKss_10,5.229 //
GK21sokss_pu:23536: ity uktā tena gatvaiva sā tatheti tadaiva tat /
GK21sokss_pu:23538: bhavatyahaṃ vaṇikputro brūhi rājñaḥ karomi kim /
GK21sokss_pu:23539: ity uktā tena sā prāyād vīrabāhor athāntikam // SoKss_10,5.231 //
GK21sokss_pu:23541: sa śrutvaivāyayau dhāvan gṛhītvā khaḍgacarmaṇī // SoKss_10,5.232 //
GK21sokss_pu:23544: evaṃ tadantaraṃ tanvi mittrayor etayor mama /
GK21sokss_pu:23545: iti bhāryātha dhavalamukhenoktā tutoṣa sā // SoKss_10,5.234 //
GK21sokss_pu:23547: tulye 'pi snigdhatāyoge tailaṃ tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ ghṛtam // SoKss_10,5.235 //
GK21sokss_pu:23551: nadīṃ prāpyāpi na papau vīkṣāṃcakre paraṃ jalam // SoKss_10,5.237 //
GK21sokss_pu:23552: tṛṣito 'pi pibasyambhaḥ kiṃ nety ukto 'tra kenacit /
GK21sokss_pu:23553: iyatkathaṃ pibāmīti mandabuddhir uvāca tam // SoKss_10,5.238 //
GK21sokss_pu:23554: kiṃ daṇḍayati rājā tvāṃ sarvaṃ pītaṃ na cettvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:23555: iti tenopahasito 'py ambu mugdhaḥ sa nāpibat // SoKss_10,5.239 //
GK21sokss_pu:23559: bahuputro daridraś ca mūrkhaḥ kaścidabhūtpumān // SoKss_10,5.241 //
GK21sokss_pu:23561: kathaṃ bālo 'yamekākī pathi dūre vrajediti // SoKss_10,5.242 //
GK21sokss_pu:23562: tataḥ sa nindyo hāsyaś ca deśānnirvāsito janaiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23563: evaṃ paśuś ca mūrkhaś ca nirvivekamatī samau // SoKss_10,5.243 //
GK21sokss_pu:23564: śrutas tvayā putraghātī bhrātṛbhautam imaṃ śṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:23565: janamadhye kathāḥ kurvan ko 'py āsīt kvāpi mugdhadhīḥ // SoKss_10,5.244 //
GK21sokss_pu:23566: sa bhavyaṃ puruṣaṃ dūrād dṛṣṭvā mūrkho 'bravīd idam /
GK21sokss_pu:23567: eṣa me bhavati bhrātā rikthamasya harāmyataḥ // SoKss_10,5.245 //
GK21sokss_pu:23568: ahaṃ tu kaścin naitasya tena naitad ṛṇaṃ mama /
GK21sokss_pu:23569: ity uktavān sa mūḍho 'tra pāṣāṇānapyahāsayat // SoKss_10,5.246 //
GK21sokss_pu:23571: bhrātṛbhautaḥ śruto deva brahmacārisutaṃ śṛṇu // SoKss_10,5.247 //
GK21sokss_pu:23575: tac chrutvā tvaṃ kuto jāta iti taṃ suhṛdo 'bruvan // SoKss_10,5.249 //
GK21sokss_pu:23576: mānaso 'haṃ sutas tasyety evaṃ punar api bruvan /
GK21sokss_pu:23577: viśeṣato vihasitaḥ sa tair jaḍaśiromaṇiḥ // SoKss_10,5.250 //
GK21sokss_pu:23579: brahmacārisutaṃ śrutvā śrūyatāṃ gaṇako 'py ayam // SoKss_10,5.251 //
GK21sokss_pu:23584: pariṣvajya sutaṃ bālaṃ sa taṃ sarvajanāgrataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23585: ruroda pṛṣṭaś ca janair evaṃ pāpo jagāda saḥ // SoKss_10,5.254 //
GK21sokss_pu:23586: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca jāne 'haṃ tadayaṃ śiśuḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23587: vipatsyate me divase saptame tena rodimi // SoKss_10,5.255 //
GK21sokss_pu:23588: ity uktvā tatra vismāpya lokaṃ prāpte 'ni saptame /
GK21sokss_pu:23589: pratyūṣa eva suptaṃ ca sa vyāpāditavānsutam // SoKss_10,5.256 //
GK21sokss_pu:23590: dṛṣṭvātha taṃ mṛtaṃ bālaṃ saṃjātapratyayair janaiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23591: pūjito dhanamāsādya svadeśaṃ svair amāyayau // SoKss_10,5.257 //
GK21sokss_pu:23593: mūrkhāḥ putram api ghnanti na rajyet teṣu buddhimān // SoKss_10,5.258 //
GK21sokss_pu:23594: ayaṃ ca śrūyatāṃ mūrkhaḥ krodhanaḥ puruṣaḥ prabho /
GK21sokss_pu:23595: bahiḥ sthitasya kasyāpi puṃsaḥ kutrāpi śṛṇvataḥ // SoKss_10,5.259 //
GK21sokss_pu:23597: tadā caiko 'bravīt tatra satyaṃ sa guṇavān sakhe // SoKss_10,5.260 //
GK21sokss_pu:23598: kiṃ tu dvau tasya doṣau staḥ sāhasī krodhanaś ca yat /
GK21sokss_pu:23599: iti vādinamevaitaṃ bahirvartī niśamya saḥ // SoKss_10,5.261 //
GK21sokss_pu:23601: re jālma sāhasaṃ kiṃ me krodhaḥ kaś ca mayā kṛtaḥ // SoKss_10,5.262 //
GK21sokss_pu:23602: ity uvāca ca sākṣepaṃ pumān krodhāgninā jvalan /
GK21sokss_pu:23603: tato hasantas tatrānye tam ūcuḥ kiṃ bravīty adaḥ // SoKss_10,5.263 //
GK21sokss_pu:23605: evaṃ svadoṣaḥ prakaṭo 'py ajñair deva na budhyate // SoKss_10,5.264 //
GK21sokss_pu:23607: rājābhūt ko'pi kanyaikā surūpājani tasya ca // SoKss_10,5.265 //
GK21sokss_pu:23611: sutaiṣā vardhate śīghraṃ sadbhartre ca pradīyate // SoKss_10,5.267 //
GK21sokss_pu:23615: adṛśyā sthāpanīyaiṣā vidhānaṃ tatra hīdṛśam // SoKss_10,5.269 //
GK21sokss_pu:23616: ity uktvā sthāspayāmāsuśchannāṃ te tāṃ nṛpatmajām /
GK21sokss_pu:23619: bruvāṇā darśayāmāsuḥ sutāṃ tasmai mahībhṛte // SoKss_10,5.271 //
GK21sokss_pu:23620: so 'pi tān pūrayām āsa vaidyāṃs tuṣṭo dhanoccayaiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:23621: iti vyājāj jaḍadhiyo dhūrtair bhujyanta īśvarāḥ // SoKss_10,5.272 //
GK21sokss_pu:23626: gate tasmiṃś ca papraccha bhāryāṃ tanvi gataḥ sa nā /
GK21sokss_pu:23627: tvattaḥ kiṃcidgṛhītveti sāpy ardhapaṇam abhyadhāt // SoKss_10,5.275 //
GK21sokss_pu:23628: tato daśapaṇān kṛtvā pātheyaṃ sa nadītaṭe /

GK21sokss_pu:24276: evaṃ nirākṛtā tena sā prabodhya patiṃ krudhā /
GK21sokss_pu:24277: yaśodharaṃ taṃ saṃdarśya jagāda rudatī śaṭhā // SoKss_10,7.33 //
GK21sokss_pu:24278: anena pāpmanā supte tvayyahaṃ dhvaṃsitā balāt /
GK21sokss_pu:24279: tac chrutvaiva sa uttasthau khaḍgamākṛṣya tatpatiḥ // SoKss_10,7.34 //
GK21sokss_pu:24280: athānyā sā satī bhāryā taṃ gṛhītvaiva pādayoḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24281: abravīnmā kṛthā mithyā pāpaṃ śṛṇu vaco mama // SoKss_10,7.35 //
GK21sokss_pu:24284: mātā mama tvamity uktvā yadanena nirākṛtā /
GK21sokss_pu:24286: anayā matsamakṣaṃ ca rātriṣviha tarau sthitāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24291: na caiṣa me satīdharmo yadbhartaryanṛtaṃ vacaḥ // SoKss_10,7.40 //
GK21sokss_pu:24293: ity uktvā bhasma cakre sā taruṃ taṃ krodhavīkṣitam // SoKss_10,7.41 //
GK21sokss_pu:24295: taddṛṣṭvā sa cirādbhartā tuṣṭastām upagūḍhavān // SoKss_10,7.42 //
GK21sokss_pu:24296: nirāsa ca dvitīyāṃ tāṃ chittvā nāsāṃ kugehinīm /
GK21sokss_pu:24299: yaśodharaṃ bhrātṛyutaṃ sanirvedo jagāda ca // SoKss_10,7.44 //
GK21sokss_pu:24301: tathāpyeṣā na śakitā pāpaikā rakṣituṃ mayā // SoKss_10,7.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:24303: sādhvī yadi paraṃ svena śīlenaikena rakṣyate // SoKss_10,7.46 //
GK21sokss_pu:24309: āgatau sthaḥ kutaḥ kutra vrajathaḥ kathyatāmiti // SoKss_10,7.49 //
GK21sokss_pu:24311: viśvāsaṃ prāpya papraccha tam apy evaṃ kutūhalāt // SoKss_10,7.50 //
GK21sokss_pu:24312: na rahasyaṃ mahābhāga yadi tadbrūhi me 'dhunā /
GK21sokss_pu:24313: kastvamīdṛśi bhoge 'pi kiṃ ca te jalavāsitā // SoKss_10,7.51 //
GK21sokss_pu:24314: tac chrutvā śrūyatāṃ vacmīty uktvā sa puruṣastadā /
GK21sokss_pu:24315: jalavāsī svavṛttāntam evaṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame // SoKss_10,7.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:24317: svargakautūhalaṃ kartuṃ martyānām iva nirmame // SoKss_10,7.53 //
GK21sokss_pu:24326: tasmin samāptaprāye ca niyame śayane mama /
GK21sokss_pu:24327: pāpā haṭhād upetyaikā bhāryā suptavatī kila // SoKss_10,7.58 //
GK21sokss_pu:24328: tūrye tu yāme vismṛtya tadbrate tanniveṣaṇam /
GK21sokss_pu:24331: ihādya jātas te dve ca bhārye jāte ihāpi me // SoKss_10,7.60 //
GK21sokss_pu:24332: ekā sā kulaṭā pāpā dvitīyeyaṃ pativratā /
GK21sokss_pu:24334: jātiṃ smarāmi yadyac ca rātrau bhogā mamedṛśāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24335: yadi nākhaṇḍayiṣyaṃ tadidaṃ syānme na janma tat // SoKss_10,7.62 //
GK21sokss_pu:24338: tato 'sya sā satī bhāryā pūrvavṛttamavetya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:24339: vinyasya jānunī bhūmāv induṃ paśyantyabhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.64 //
GK21sokss_pu:24340: bho lokapālāḥ satyaṃ cedahaṃ sādhvī pativratā /
GK21sokss_pu:24341: tadambubāsamukto 'dya svargaṃ yātveṣa me patiḥ // SoKss_10,7.65 //
GK21sokss_pu:24342: ity uktavatyām evāsyāṃ khād vimānam avātarat /
GK21sokss_pu:24343: tadārūḍhau ca tau svargaṃ daṃpatī saha jagmatuḥ // SoKss_10,7.66 //
GK21sokss_pu:24345: tau ca viprau tadālokya vismayaṃ yayatuḥ param // SoKss_10,7.67 //
GK21sokss_pu:24346: nītvā ca rātriśeṣaṃ taṃ prabhāte sa yaśodharaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24347: lakṣmīdharaś ca viprau tau bhrātarau prasthitau tataḥ // SoKss_10,7.68 //
GK21sokss_pu:24350: he viprau tiṣṭhataṃ tāvadahamadya karomi vām /
GK21sokss_pu:24351: snānānnapānair ātithyaṃ gṛhaṃ me hy āgatau yuvām // SoKss_10,7.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:24352: ity uktvā vyaramad vāk ca jajñe tatrāmbuvāpikā /
GK21sokss_pu:24361: abhūvaṃ tasya me jātā daivācchramaṇasaṃgatiḥ // SoKss_10,7.75 //
GK21sokss_pu:24363: śaṭhena sāyaṃ kenāpi bhojito 'smi balātpunaḥ // SoKss_10,7.76 //
GK21sokss_pu:24365: pūrṇaṃ yadyakariṣyaṃ tadabhaviṣyaṃ suro divi // SoKss_10,7.77 //
GK21sokss_pu:24366: evaṃ mayoktaḥ svodanto yuvāṃ kathayataṃ tu me /
GK21sokss_pu:24367: kuto yuvāṃ kimetāṃ ca praviṣṭau stho marusthalīm // SoKss_10,7.78 //
GK21sokss_pu:24369: tatas tau brāhmaṇau yakṣaḥ punarevam abhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.79 //
GK21sokss_pu:24371: kṛtavidyau gṛhaṃ yātaṃ videśabhramaṇena kim // SoKss_10,7.80 //
GK21sokss_pu:24372: ity uktvā sa dadau tābhyāṃ vidyāstau ca tadaiva tāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24373: tatprabhāvājjagṛhatuḥ so 'tha yakṣo jagāda tau // SoKss_10,7.81 //
GK21sokss_pu:24377: bhojanaṃ bhikṣuvelāyāṃ manasaḥ saṃyamaḥ kṣamā // SoKss_10,7.83 //
GK21sokss_pu:24386: athaitya sa gururyakṣo vimānastho jagāda tau /
GK21sokss_pu:24387: yuṣmatprasādād devatvaṃ prāpto 'smy uttīrya yakṣatām // SoKss_10,7.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:24389: bhavitā yena devatvaṃ dehānte yuvayor iti // SoKss_10,7.89 //
GK21sokss_pu:24390: akṣīṇārthāv idānīṃ ca varān mama bhaviṣyathaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24391: ity uktvā sa vimānena kāmacārī yayau divam // SoKss_10,7.90 //
GK21sokss_pu:24392: tato yaśodharo lakṣmīdharaś ca bhrātarāv ubhau /
GK21sokss_pu:24393: kṛtvā vrataṃ tatprāptārthavidyāv āstāṃ yathāsukham // SoKss_10,7.91 //
GK21sokss_pu:24397: vatseśvarasutaḥ prepsuḥ sa śaktiyaśasaṃ priyām // SoKss_10,7.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:24400: athānurūpaṃ bhuktvā ca tatra sāyaṃ svamandiram /

GK21sokss_pu:24402: tatra taṃ gomukho bhūyo vinodayitum abravīt /
GK21sokss_pu:24408: tatphalāsvādahṛṣṭaś ca sa pracakre kalaṃ ravam /
GK21sokss_pu:24410: tathaiva cākṣipannityaṃ phalāni sa tathaiva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:24411: śiśumāro rutaṃ cakre jajñe sakhyaṃ tatas tayoḥ // SoKss_10,7.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:24413: śiśumāro dinaṃ sthitvā sa sāyaṃ svagṛhaṃ yayau // SoKss_10,7.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:24414: jñātārthā tasya bhāryā ca sadā virahadaṃ divā /
GK21sokss_pu:24416: brūhi priye kimasvāsthyaṃ tava kena ca śāmyati /
GK21sokss_pu:24417: ityārtastaṃ sa papraccha śiśumāraḥ priyāṃ muhuḥ // SoKss_10,7.103 //
GK21sokss_pu:24418: nirbandhapṛṣṭāpi yadā na sā prativaco dadau /
GK21sokss_pu:24419: rahasyajñā sakhī tasyāstadā taṃ pratyabhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:24420: yady api tvaṃ na kuruṣe necchatyeṣā tathāpy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:24421: bravīmi vibudhaḥ khedaṃ janānāṃ nihnute katham // SoKss_10,7.105 //
GK21sokss_pu:24423: vinā vānarahṛtpadmayūṣaṃ na śamameti yaḥ // SoKss_10,7.106 //
GK21sokss_pu:24424: ity uktaḥ sa priyāsakhyā śiśumāro vyacintayat /
GK21sokss_pu:24425: kaṣṭaṃ vānarahṛtpadmaṃ kutaḥ saṃprāpnuyām aham // SoKss_10,7.107 //
GK21sokss_pu:24427: sakhyā kimathavā bhāryā prāṇebhyo 'py adhikapriyā // SoKss_10,7.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:24428: ityālocya svabhāryāṃ tāṃ śiśumāro jagāda saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24429: tarhyānayāmyakhaṇḍaṃ te kapiṃ kiṃ dūyase priye // SoKss_10,7.109 //
GK21sokss_pu:24430: ity uktvā sa yayau yasya mittrasya nikaṭaṃ kapeḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24432: adyāpi na sakhe dṛṣṭaṃ gṛhaṃ bhāryā ca me tvayā /
GK21sokss_pu:24433: tadehi tatra gacchāvo viśramāyaikam apy ahaḥ // SoKss_10,7.111 //
GK21sokss_pu:24435: pradṛśyante na dārāś ca kaitavaṃ tan na sauhṛdam // SoKss_10,7.112 //
GK21sokss_pu:24437: vānaraṃ śiśumāras taṃ gantuṃ pravavṛte 'tra saḥ // SoKss_10,7.113 //
GK21sokss_pu:24438: gacchantaṃ taṃ sa dṛṣṭvā ca vānaraścakitākulam /
GK21sokss_pu:24439: sakhe 'nyādṛśamadya tvāṃ paśyāmīti sa pṛṣṭavān // SoKss_10,7.114 //
GK21sokss_pu:24440: nirbandhenātha pṛcchantaṃ matvā hastasthitaṃ ca tam /
GK21sokss_pu:24442: asvasthā me sthitā bhāryā sā ca pathyopayogi mām /
GK21sokss_pu:24443: yācate kapihṛtpadmaṃ tenādya vimanāḥ sthitā // SoKss_10,7.116 //
GK21sokss_pu:24444: śrutvaitatsa vacas tasya kapiḥ prājño vyacintayat /

GK21sokss_pu:24448: itthaṃ saṃcintya ca prāha śiśumāraṃ sa vānaraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24449: yadyevaṃ tattvayaitanme kiṃ noktaṃ prathamaṃ sakhe // SoKss_10,7.119 //
GK21sokss_pu:24451: vāsodumbaravṛkṣe hi tadidānīṃ mama sthitam // SoKss_10,7.120 //
GK21sokss_pu:24455: tatra tenāntakeneva muktaḥ sa ca kapistaṭam // SoKss_10,7.122 //
GK21sokss_pu:24457: gaccha re mūrkha hṛdayaṃ dehādbhavati kiṃ pṛthak // SoKss_10,7.123 //
GK21sokss_pu:24458: mayaivaṃ mocito hy ātmā na cātraiṣyāmyahaṃ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24459: kimatra na śrutā mūrkha gardabhākhyāyikā tvayā // SoKss_10,7.124 //
GK21sokss_pu:24460: āsīdgomāyusacivaḥ siṃhaḥ ko'pi vane kva cit /

GK21sokss_pu:24463: tatra sthitaṃ gate tasmin rājñy anāhāraniḥsaham /

GK21sokss_pu:24466: sīdatyeva śarīraṃ te samaṃ parijanena yat // SoKss_10,7.128 //
GK21sokss_pu:24467: ity uktaḥ sa sṛgālena tena siṃho jagāda tam /
GK21sokss_pu:24468: sakhe nāhaṃ vraṇākrāntaḥ śaknomi bhramituṃ kva cit // SoKss_10,7.129 //
GK21sokss_pu:24470: tanme vraṇāni rohanti prakṛtistho bhavāmi ca // SoKss_10,7.130 //
GK21sokss_pu:24471: tadānaya kuto 'pi tvaṃ gatvā gardabhamāśu me /
GK21sokss_pu:24472: ity uktastena gomāyuḥ sa tatheti yayau tataḥ // SoKss_10,7.131 //
GK21sokss_pu:24474: prītyevopetya vakti sma durbalaḥ kiṃ bhavāniti // SoKss_10,7.132 //
GK21sokss_pu:24476: ity uktavantaṃ ca kharaṃ tam uvāca sa jambukaḥ // SoKss_10,7.133 //
GK21sokss_pu:24477: iha kiṃ vahasi kleśamehi tvāṃ prāpayāmy aham /
GK21sokss_pu:24478: vanaṃ svargasukhaṃ yatra kharībhiḥ saha vardhase // SoKss_10,7.134 //
GK21sokss_pu:24479: tac chrutvā sa tathety uktvā gardabho bhogalolupaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24480: vanaṃ siṃhasya tasyāgāttena gomāyunā saha // SoKss_10,7.135 //
GK21sokss_pu:24481: taṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva tasyaitya pṛṣṭhato gardabhasya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24483: sa tena vīkṣitastrastaḥ palāyya sahasā kharaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24484: āgacchanna ca taṃ siṃho 'py apatadvihvalākulaḥ // SoKss_10,7.137 //
GK21sokss_pu:24486: tatas taṃ jambuko mantrī sopālambham abhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:24488: hariṇādivadhe kā tadvārtā tava bhaviṣyati // SoKss_10,7.139 //
GK21sokss_pu:24489: tac chrutvā so 'bravītsiṃho yathā vetsi tathā punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24490: tamānaya kharaṃ tāvat sajjo bhūtvā nihanmy aham // SoKss_10,7.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:24491: iti sa preṣitastena punaḥ siṃhena jambukaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24492: gatvā kharaṃ tamavadadvidrutaḥ kiṃ bhavāniti // SoKss_10,7.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:24494: taṃ ca bhūyaḥ sa gomāyurvihasya kharam abravīt // SoKss_10,7.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:24495: mithyaiva vibhramo dṛṣṭastvayā na tvatra tādṛśam /
GK21sokss_pu:24496: sattvamasti sukhaṃ hy atra vasāmy ahamapīdṛśaḥ // SoKss_10,7.143 //
GK21sokss_pu:24498: iti tadvacasā mūḍhastatrāgātsa kharaḥ punaḥ // SoKss_10,7.144 //
GK21sokss_pu:24499: āgataṃ taṃ ca dṛṣṭvaiva sa nirgatya guhāmukhāt /
GK21sokss_pu:24501: nikṛtya gardabhaṃ taṃ ca sthāpayitvā ca rakṣakam /

GK21sokss_pu:24503: tatkālaṃ jambukas tasya sa māyāvī kharasya tat /
GK21sokss_pu:24504: bhakṣayām āsa hṛdayaṃ karṇau cāpy ātmatṛptaye // SoKss_10,7.147 //
GK21sokss_pu:24505: snātvāgatas tathābhūtaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā gardabhaṃ hariḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24506: kva karṇau hṛdayaṃ cāsyetyapṛcchattaṃ ca jambukam // SoKss_10,7.148 //
GK21sokss_pu:24510: tanmāṃsam anyat taccheṣaṃ jambuko 'pi cakhāda saḥ // SoKss_10,7.150 //
GK21sokss_pu:24513: evaṃ tasmātkapeḥ śrutvā śiśumāro yayau gṛham /
GK21sokss_pu:24514: mohādasiddhaṃ bhāryārthaṃ śocanmittraṃ ca hāritam // SoKss_10,7.152 //
GK21sokss_pu:24516: kapiḥ so 'py ambudhestīre cacāra ca yathāsukham // SoKss_10,7.153 //
GK21sokss_pu:24518: durjane kṛṣṇasarpe ca kuto viśvāsataḥ sukham // SoKss_10,7.154 //
GK21sokss_pu:24519: ityākhyāya kathāsṃ mantrī gomukhaḥ punareva saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24525: dehi gāndharvikāyāsmai dve sahasre paṇān iti /
GK21sokss_pu:24526: evaṃ karomīty uktvā ca sa bhāṇḍāgāriko yayau // SoKss_10,7.158 //
GK21sokss_pu:24527: gāndharviko 'tha gatvā tān paṇāṃs tasmād ayācata /
GK21sokss_pu:24528: na cāsmai sthitasaṃvittān paṇān bhāṇḍāriko dadau // SoKss_10,7.159 //
GK21sokss_pu:24530: uvāca kiṃ tvayā dattaṃ yena pratidadāni te // SoKss_10,7.160 //
GK21sokss_pu:24531: vīṇāvādyena me kṣipraṃ tvayā śrutisukhaṃ kṛtam /
GK21sokss_pu:24532: tathaiva dānavākyena kṛtaṃ kṣipraṃ mayāpi te // SoKss_10,7.161 //
GK21sokss_pu:24533: tac chrutvā vihatāśo 'pi hasitvā vaiṇiko yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:24534: kīnāśoktyāsnayā kiṃ na hāso grāvṇo 'pi jāyate // SoKss_10,7.162 //
GK21sokss_pu:24537: tayor eko guros tasya dakṣiṇaṃ pādamanvaham /
GK21sokss_pu:24538: abhyañjankṣālayām āsa vāmaṃ pādaṃ tathetaraḥ // SoKss_10,7.164 //
GK21sokss_pu:24540: abhyaktavāmapādaṃ taṃ dvitīyaṃ śiṣyam abhyadhāt // SoKss_10,7.165 //
GK21sokss_pu:24541: tvam eva dakṣiṇaṃ pādamabhyajya kṣālayādya me /
GK21sokss_pu:24542: śrutvaitanmūrkhaśiṣyo 'sau guruṃ svair am abhāṣata // SoKss_10,7.166 //
GK21sokss_pu:24543: pratipakṣasya saṃbandhī na pādo 'bhyaṅgya eṣa me /
GK21sokss_pu:24546: guroḥ śiṣyaḥ sa caraṇaṃ balād grāvṇā ca bhagnavān // SoKss_10,7.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:24547: muktākrande gurau tasmin kuśiṣyo 'nyaiḥ praviśya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24548: tāḍyamānaḥ saśokena guruṇā tena mocitaḥ // SoKss_10,7.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:24549: anyedyuḥ so 'paraḥ śiṣyaḥ prāpto grāmād vilokya tām /
GK21sokss_pu:24550: aṅghripīḍāṃ guroḥ pṛṣṭavṛttāntaḥ prajvalan krudhā // SoKss_10,7.170 //
GK21sokss_pu:24551: nāhaṃ bhanajmi kiṃ pādaṃ tasya saṃbandhinaṃ dviṣaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24552: ityākṛṣya dvitīyāṅghrīṃ guros tasya babhañja saḥ // SoKss_10,7.171 //
GK21sokss_pu:24554: guruṇā tena kṛpayā duḥśiṣyaḥ so 'py amocyata // SoKss_10,7.172 //
GK21sokss_pu:24555: sarvadveṣyopahāsyau tau śiṣyau dvau yayatus tataḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24556: guruś ca svakṣamāślāghyaḥ svasthaḥ so 'py abhavatkramāt // SoKss_10,7.173
GK21sokss_pu:24560: kasyāpy aher dve śirasī abhūtām agrapucchayoḥ // SoKss_10,7.175 //
GK21sokss_pu:24564: ekadāsya śiraḥ paucchaṃ mārge kaṣṭamavāpa tat // SoKss_10,7.177 //
GK21sokss_pu:24567: tenaiva cāndhena tataḥ sa mukhena bhramannahiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:24569: evaṃ guṇasya ye 'lpasya bahavo nāntaraṃ viduḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:25182: tac chrutvā bāḍhamity ukte mantribhiḥ sa jagāda tam /

GK21sokss_pu:25206: tad budhyadhvaṃ samaṃ sarve jānu me paśyateti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:25207: bhikṣūn pratyabravīd etāñ śvadaṣṭaṃ jānu darśayan // SoKss_10,9.138 //
GK21sokss_pu:25211: kadaryaḥ ko 'py abhūtkvāpi mūrkhaṣṭakko mahādhanaḥ // SoKss_10,9.140 //
GK21sokss_pu:25213: anyasyānnasya bubudhe naiva svādaṃ sa jātucit // SoKss_10,9.141 //
GK21sokss_pu:25214: ekadā prerito dhātrā sa bhāryām abravīnnijām /
GK21sokss_pu:25215: kṣīriṇīṃ prati jātā me śraddhā tāmadya me paca // SoKss_10,9.142 //
GK21sokss_pu:25216: tatheti tasya sā bhāryā papāca kṣīriṇīṃ tadā /

GK21sokss_pu:25218: dṛṣṭvā prāghuṇikaḥ kaścid atra me mā sma bhūditi /

GK21sokss_pu:25224: bhartā me mṛta ityevaṃ vadeś ca suhṛdaṃ mama /

GK21sokss_pu:25228: bhartā mṛto me paśyeti tayāktaḥ sa vyacintayat /

GK21sokss_pu:25233: dhūrto hā mittra hā mittretyākrandaṃs tatra tasthivān // SoKss_10,9.151 //
GK21sokss_pu:25236: uttiṣṭha bāndhavair yāvadetair nītvā na dahyase /

GK21sokss_pu:25241: iti pratyabravīdbhāryām upāṃśveva sa tāṃ jaḍaḥ // SoKss_10,9.155 //

GK21sokss_pu:25258: tataḥ śiṣyānupādhyāyaḥ sa jagāda jaḍo nijān /

GK21sokss_pu:25265: pṛṣṭhopari dadhānaṃ ca lomaśaṃ hariṇājinam // SoKss_10,9.167 //
GK21sokss_pu:25266: dṛṣṭvā taṃ saiṣa mārjāraḥ prāpto 'smābhir yathāśrutaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:25267: ityavaṣṭabhya taṃ ninyurupādhyāyāntikaṃ ca te // SoKss_10,9.168 //
GK21sokss_pu:25269: dṛṣṭvā taṃ sthāpayām āsa rātrau tatra maṭhāntare // SoKss_10,9.169 //
GK21sokss_pu:25272: sa ca bhauto baṭuḥ śiṣyas tasya viprasya yena tat /

GK21sokss_pu:25277: ānīta ity upādhyāyo bhautaḥ śiṣyāś ca te 'vadan // SoKss_10,9.173 //
GK21sokss_pu:25278: tato vihasya so 'vādīdvipro mūḍhāḥ kva mānuṣaḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:25289: taḍāgaṃ kārayām āsa nātidūre nijānmaṭhāt // SoKss_10,9.179 //

GK21sokss_pu:25333: ity ucyate sma panthānaṃ paripṛcchañjanaiś ca saḥ // SoKss_10,9.201 //
GK21sokss_pu:25334: tatas tasya taroḥ pṛṣṭhaṃ gatvārūḍhaḥ sa mūḍhadhīḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:25368: svayauvanādikair īdṛg darpaś cet tava tāṃ yadi /

GK21sokss_pu:25370: tac chrutvā kṣamayitvā tāṃ rājaputraḥ sa pṛṣṭavān /

GK21sokss_pu:25379: tac chrutvā sā hiraṇyākṣaṃ taṃ yogeśvaryabhāṣata // SoKss_10,9.224 //
GK21sokss_pu:25381: āgatya cāham eva tvāṃ tatra neṣyāmyataḥ param // SoKss_10,9.225 //
GK21sokss_pu:25383: prātaḥ prāpsyāsmi nityaṃ hi tamarcitum upaimy aham // SoKss_10,9.226 //
GK21sokss_pu:25384: ity uktvā nabhasā prāyāttāpasī sā svasiddhitaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:25386: tatra tasyai hiraṇyākṣaguṇān yuktyā śaśaṃsa sā /
GK21sokss_pu:25387: tathā yathā divyakanyā sātyutkaivam uvāca tām // SoKss_10,9.228 //
GK21sokss_pu:25388: tādṛśaṃ cenna bhartāraṃ prāpnuyāṃ bhagavaty aham /
GK21sokss_pu:25389: tanniṣphalena kiṃ kāryamamunā jīvitena me // SoKss_10,9.229 //
GK21sokss_pu:25391: mṛgāṅkalekhā tāpasyā sahovāsa tayā niśām // SoKss_10,9.230 //
GK21sokss_pu:25393: suptaḥ kathaṃcijjagade gauryā svapne niśākṣaye // SoKss_10,9.231 //
GK21sokss_pu:25394: vidyādharaḥ san prāptas tvaṃ muniśāpena martyatām /

GK21sokss_pu:25398: ityādiśyaiva sā devī tiro 'bhūttasya so 'pi ca /
GK21sokss_pu:25399: prabudhya prātar utthāya cakre snānādimaṅgalam // SoKss_10,9.234 //
GK21sokss_pu:25401: yatra saṃketakaṃ tasya tāpasyā vihitaṃ tayā // SoKss_10,9.235 //
GK21sokss_pu:25402: atrāntare ca katham apy āptanidrāṃ svamandire /

GK21sokss_pu:25405: karasparśena tāpasyāḥ patiṃ prāpsyasy alaṃ śucā // SoKss_10,9.237 //
GK21sokss_pu:25406: ity uktvāntarhitāyāṃ ca devyāṃ prātaḥ prabudhya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:25407: mṛgāṅkalekhā tāpasyai tasyai svapnaṃ śaśaṃsa tam // SoKss_10,9.238 //
GK21sokss_pu:25408: sā tac chrutvaiva cāgatya bhūlokaṃ siddhatāpasī /
GK21sokss_pu:25409: sthitaṃ kṣetre 'mareśasya hiraṇyākṣaṃ tam abhyadhāt // SoKss_10,9.239 //
GK21sokss_pu:25410: ehi vaidyādharaṃ lokaṃ putrety uktvā kareṇa sā /
GK21sokss_pu:25411: praṇataṃ taṃ samādāya bāhāvudapatan nabhaḥ // SoKss_10,9.240 //
GK21sokss_pu:25412: tāvat sa sa hiraṇyākṣo bhūtvā vidyādhareśvaraḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:25413: smṛtvā śāpakṣayājjātiṃ tāpasīṃ tām abhāṣata // SoKss_10,9.241 //
GK21sokss_pu:25418: śaptasya me tadā bhāryā yā duḥkhādajahattanum /
GK21sokss_pu:25419: saiṣā mṛgāṅkalekhādya jātā pūrvapriyā mama // SoKss_10,9.244 //
GK21sokss_pu:25420: idānīṃ ca tvayā sārdhaṃ gatvā prāpsyāmi tāmaham /
GK21sokss_pu:25421: tvatkarasparśapūtasya śāntaḥ śāpo hi so 'dya me // SoKss_10,9.245 //
GK21sokss_pu:25422: iti bruvaṃstayā sākaṃ tāpasyā gaganena saḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26130: uddhārayām āsa ca tau vaśānāgau mahātapāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26132: tatas tasminmunau yāte daṃpatī tau vaśāgajau /
GK21sokss_pu:26133: mṛtyor viyogāc cottīrṇau yathākāmaṃ vijahratuḥ // SoKss_12,1.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:26135: prabhuṃ nojjhanti mittraṃ vā tārayanti tataḥ punaḥ // SoKss_12,1.29 //
GK21sokss_pu:26136: hīnajātyudbhavā ye tu teṣāṃ spṛśati nāśayam /
GK21sokss_pu:26137: kadācidapi sattvaṃ vā sneho vā cañcalātmanām // SoKss_12,1.30 //
GK21sokss_pu:26145: tasyāṃ sa vāmadattākhyaṃ bhavyaṃ putramajījanat // SoKss_12,1.34 //
GK21sokss_pu:26147: bhāryāṃ śaśiprabhāṃ nāma pariṇinye pitṛpriyaḥ // SoKss_12,1.35 //
GK21sokss_pu:26149: prāvartata ca gārhasthye sa tayā bhāryayā saha // SoKss_12,1.36 //
GK21sokss_pu:26152: ekadā rājasevārthaṃ sthitas tatkaṭake ca saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26153: gṛhādetya pitṛvyena nijena jagade rahaḥ // SoKss_12,1.38 //
GK21sokss_pu:26154: naṣṭamasmatkulaṃ putra yato bhāryā mayā tava /
GK21sokss_pu:26156: etat pitṛvyād ākarṇya kaṭake taṃ niveśya ca /
GK21sokss_pu:26158: tatra guptaṃ sthito yāvat puṣpārāme praviśya saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26162: tato bhuktavatā tena sākaṃ sā śasyanaṃ yayau /
GK21sokss_pu:26164: āḥ pāpau gacchathaḥ kveti vadatas tasya gehinī /
GK21sokss_pu:26165: sā dṛṣṭvotthāya dhigjālmety uktvā dhūliṃ mukhe nyadhāt // SoKss_12,1.44 //
GK21sokss_pu:26167: vāmadattaḥ smṛtistvasya tadbhāve na vyalupyata // SoKss_12,1.45 //
GK21sokss_pu:26168: tato mahiṣamadhye sā nikṣipya laguḍaiḥ śaṭhā /
GK21sokss_pu:26169: bhāryā mahiṣapālena tāḍayām āsa tena tam // SoKss_12,1.46 //
GK21sokss_pu:26170: tadaiva taṃ ca kasyāpi vaṇijo mahiṣārthinaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26171: vikrīṇīte sma sā krūrā tiryaktvavivaśīkṛtam // SoKss_12,1.47 //
GK21sokss_pu:26176: iti taṃ cintayantaṃ ca tatrodvāṣpaṃ suduḥkhitam /
GK21sokss_pu:26178: sā buddhvā jñānataḥ sarvaṃ tadvṛttāntaṃ kṛpākulā /
GK21sokss_pu:26181: tasmai kāntimatīṃ nāma kanyāṃ duhitaraṃ dadau // SoKss_12,1.52 //
GK21sokss_pu:26182: ebhir āhatya durbhāryāmādyāṃ tāṃ vaḍavāṃ kuru /
GK21sokss_pu:26183: ity uktvā pradadau cāsmai sarṣapānabhimantritān // SoKss_12,1.53 //
GK21sokss_pu:26184: tataḥ sa tāṃ kāntimatīṃ bhāryāmādāya nūtanām /
GK21sokss_pu:26186: hatvā mahiṣapālaṃ taṃ tatra kṛtvā ca sarṣapaiḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26187: vaḍavāmādyabhāryāṃ tāṃ śālābaddhāṃ vyadhatta saḥ // SoKss_12,1.55 //
GK21sokss_pu:26189: sa cakre bhojanaṃ baddhapratijño vairaśuddhaye // SoKss_12,1.56 //
GK21sokss_pu:26190: evaṃ tatra sthitasyāsya kāntimatyā samaṃ punaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26192: bhoktuṃ tasmin pravṛtte ca so 'bhuktvā niryayau drutam /
GK21sokss_pu:26195: niyatās tāḥ praviśyātra bubhuje jātanirvṛtiḥ // SoKss_12,1.59 //
GK21sokss_pu:26196: tato 'tithir vismitaḥ sa taṃ papraccha sakautukaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26199: tamā mūlātsvavṛttāntamatha so 'pi tam abhyadhāt // SoKss_12,1.61 //
GK21sokss_pu:26200: durgraheṇa kim etena paśutvaṃ te hṛtaṃ yayā /
GK21sokss_pu:26201: tām evārādhya svaśvaśrūṃ pakarṣaṃ kaṃcid āhara // SoKss_12,1.62 //
GK21sokss_pu:26202: ity ukto 'tithinā tena vāmadattas tatheti tat /
GK21sokss_pu:26203: śraddhāya so 'tithiṃ prātaḥ satkṛtya visasarja tam // SoKss_12,1.63 //
GK21sokss_pu:26205: anugrahārthī so 'bhyarcya prārthayām āsa yatnataḥ // SoKss_12,1.64 //
GK21sokss_pu:26208: tataḥ śrīparvataṃ gatvā sa vidyāṃ tāmasādhayat /
GK21sokss_pu:26209: sā ca siddhā satī sākṣāttasmai khaḍgottamaṃ dadau // SoKss_12,1.66 //
GK21sokss_pu:26210: prāptakhaḍgaś ca saṃpannaḥ sa tayā bhāryayā saha /
GK21sokss_pu:26215: tasyāṃ patnyāṃ samutpannā nāmnā lalitalocanā // SoKss_12,1.69 //
GK21sokss_pu:26217: bhāryā bhavitrī nirdiṣṭā gaganodbhūtayā girā // SoKss_12,1.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:26220: ityākhyātakulāṃ tāṃ buddhvā vidyādharīṃ sa bahu mene /
GK21sokss_pu:26222: āsta ca tatra tayā saha saṃprati taṃ cāsya vatsarājādyāḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26224: iti mahākaviśrīsomadevabhaṭṭaviracite kathāsaritsāgare śaśāṅkavatīlambake prathamas taraṅgaḥ
GK21sokss_pu:26231: tasyāṃ priyāyāṃ gahane gatāyāṃ dṛṣṭigocarāt // SoKss_12,2.3 //
GK21sokss_pu:26234: puṣpāṇy uccinvatī yāvan na samabhyeti sā priyā /
GK21sokss_pu:26235: tāvat snātvā sarasy asmin kṣaṇam āse sarastaṭe // SoKss_12,2.5 //
GK21sokss_pu:26236: iti saṃcintya sa snātvā kṛtadevārcano 'tra ca /
GK21sokss_pu:26241: dūrasthāṃ tāṃ sa sasmāra priyāṃ madanamañcukām // SoKss_12,2.8 //
GK21sokss_pu:26243: tatkṣaṇaṃ cāyayau snātuṃ tatraiko punipuṃgavaḥ // SoKss_12,2.9 //
GK21sokss_pu:26246: tataḥ prabuddhaṃ praṇataṃ divyadṛṣṭiḥ sa taṃ muniḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26248: tena hi prāpyate sasrvaṃ tathā caitya madāśramam /

GK21sokss_pu:26252: kṛtvātithyaṃ phalais tasya tatra bhuktaphalaḥ svayam /

GK21sokss_pu:26257: bhāryā vahneriva svāhā babhūva surataprabhā // SoKss_12,2.16 //

GK21sokss_pu:26266: taiḥ samaṃ sa sukhaṃ tiṣṭhanrājaputraḥ pitur gṛhe /

GK21sokss_pu:26272: utthite churikāhas te mayi so 'tha palāyitum /

GK21sokss_pu:26274: sa ca gatvā nadīpāraṃ prasārya rasanāṃ mayi /

GK21sokss_pu:26276: tayaiva setupṛthvyā ca yāvattīrṇo 'smi tāṃ nadīm /

GK21sokss_pu:26278: ko bhavāniti pṛṣṭaś ca mayā sa puruṣo 'bravīt /

GK21sokss_pu:26281: bhāryā mṛgāṅkadattasya kā bhaviṣyati me prabhoḥ // SoKss_12,2.28 //
GK21sokss_pu:26283: asyujjayinyāṃ nṛpatiḥ karmasena iti śrutaḥ // SoKss_12,2.29 //

GK21sokss_pu:26289: āgato gṛhamityetanniśi vṛttaṃ mama prabho // SoKss_12,2.32 //

GK21sokss_pu:26304: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca prabuddho 'smi prayātā ca vibhāvarī /

GK21sokss_pu:26315: prajñābalānmayā prāpyā sā śaśāṅkavatī sutā // SoKss_12,2.45 //

GK21sokss_pu:26338: dhruvaṃ vyutthāya yāteyaṃ tatpaśyāmaḥ kva gacchati /

GK21sokss_pu:26341: dṛṣṭvā nivāsasthānaṃ svam ājagāma tadaiva saḥ // SoKss_12,2.58 //
GK21sokss_pu:26342: prātaś ca hastipālasya hṛtārthā tāṃ gatāṃ priyām /
GK21sokss_pu:26346: āgacchāsmadguroḥ pārśvaṃ jñānī sarvaṃ hi vetti saḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26347: ity uktvā ca tamāninyurnikaṭaṃ tasya mantriṇaḥ // SoKss_12,2.61 //
GK21sokss_pu:26348: sa ca hastipako dṛṣṭvā pādayoś ca praṇamya tam /

GK21sokss_pu:26352: tataḥ praṇamya taṃ gatvā samaṃ nagararakṣibhiḥ /

GK21sokss_pu:26365: yayau svadeśaṃ magadhān hastī tena vyapādi ca // SoKss_12,2.70 //
GK21sokss_pu:26369: anaṅgalīlāṃ kanyāṃ tāṃ dūtaṃ ca visasarja saḥ // SoKss_12,2.72 //
GK21sokss_pu:26371: bhajanti vaitasīṃ vṛttiṃ rājānaḥ kālavedinaḥ // SoKss_12,2.73 //
GK21sokss_pu:26373: anaṅgalīlāṃ saṃprāpa bhadrabāhuḥ sa bhūpatiḥ // SoKss_12,2.74 //

GK21sokss_pu:26376: sarvaṃ setsyati te hārāt svapnadṛṣṭād anugrahāt /
GK21sokss_pu:26377: amogho devatānāṃ ca prasādaḥ kiṃ na sādhayet // SoKss_12,2.76 //
GK21sokss_pu:26378: tathā ca śṛṇutātraikāṃ varṇyamānāṃ mayā kathām /
GK21sokss_pu:26380: sa putrakāmaḥ padmānāṃ śatenāṣṭabhir eva ca /
GK21sokss_pu:26381: sitānāṃ pūjayām āsa khaḍge lakṣmīṃ dine dine // SoKss_12,2.78 //
GK21sokss_pu:26384: sa hṛtpadmaṃ vipāṭya svaṃ dadau devyai tataś ca sā /
GK21sokss_pu:26385: tuṣṭā tasmai dadau sārvabhaumaputrapradaṃ varam // SoKss_12,2.80 //
GK21sokss_pu:26387: atha tasya suto rājño mahādevyāmajāyata // SoKss_12,2.81 //
GK21sokss_pu:26389: puṣkarākṣaṃ nṛpaścakre nāmnā putraṃ sulakṣaṇam // SoKss_12,2.82 //
GK21sokss_pu:26390: kramāc ca yauvanaprāptaṃ tanayaṃ taṃ guṇānvitam /

GK21sokss_pu:26395: iti śuśrāva sa giraṃ gaganādudgatāṃ tadā // SoKss_12,2.85 //
GK21sokss_pu:26399: pravṛttaṃ karabhaṃ dṛṣṭvā śokākrānto nyapātayat // SoKss_12,2.87 //
GK21sokss_pu:26401: bhūtvā vidyādharaḥ prītaḥ puṣkarākṣaṃ tam abravīt // SoKss_12,2.88 //
GK21sokss_pu:26402: bhavān kṛtopakāro me tatte yad vacmi tac chṛṇu /
GK21sokss_pu:26409: daṃpatī prasaratprītī tāsu tāsu svabhūmiṣu // SoKss_12,2.92 //
GK21sokss_pu:26411: anyonyaviprayuktau tau jātau kvāpi vanāntare // SoKss_12,2.93 //
GK21sokss_pu:26416: upāviśac ca viśrāntyai bhṛṅgīrūpaṃ vidhāya sā /
GK21sokss_pu:26417: vṛkṣe tasminn athaikasmin kusume madhupāyinī // SoKss_12,2.96 //
GK21sokss_pu:26419: harṣacyutena vīryeṇa siktaṃ puṣpaṃ tayāśu tat // SoKss_12,2.97 //
GK21sokss_pu:26420: tyaktvā bhṛṅgīvapurgatvā saṃgatābhūc ca tena sā /
GK21sokss_pu:26421: jyotsneva śaśinā bhartrā cinvatā raṅkumālinā // SoKss_12,2.98 //
GK21sokss_pu:26425: samabhūnnahi divyānāṃ vīryaṃ bhajati moghatām // SoKss_12,2.100 //
GK21sokss_pu:26427: tatrāgādapatattac ca pakvaṃ jambutaroḥ phalam // SoKss_12,2.101 //
GK21sokss_pu:26429: avandata munes tasya caraṇau vinayānatā // SoKss_12,2.102 //
GK21sokss_pu:26430: sa divyadṛṣṭir dṛṣṭvā tāṃ buddhvā tattvaṃ savismayaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26432: tatra kālena sā vṛddhiṃ prāptā tasyāśrame muneḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:26433: dṛṣṭā vinayavatyeṣā nabhasā gacchatā mayā // SoKss_12,2.104 //
GK21sokss_pu:26436: tatkṣaṇaṃ sa muniḥ kruddhaḥ krandantyā śrāvitastayā /
GK21sokss_pu:26440: bhartā vinayavatyāś ca sa evāsyā bhaviṣyati /
GK21sokss_pu:26441: ityahaṃ muninā śapto jāto 'syāṃ karabho bhuvi // SoKss_12,2.108 //
GK21sokss_pu:26443: pārasthaṃ tadvanaṃ gaccha nāmnā surabhimārutam // SoKss_12,2.109 //
GK21sokss_pu:26445: ity uktvā puṣkarākṣaṃ sa divaṃ vidyādharo yayau // SoKss_12,2.110 //

GK21sokss_pu:40340: ekā putro na yat tasya tāvadeko 'py ajāyata // SoKss_17,5.13 //
GK21sokss_pu:40342: jagmuḥ pātālamasurā hataśeṣāḥ palāyya ye // SoKss_17,5.14 //
GK21sokss_pu:40345: na ca tān prāpa sa nṛpaḥ pātālavyomacāriṇaḥ /
GK21sokss_pu:40346: tejasvī tena saṃtepe niḥsapatne 'pi bhūtale // SoKss_17,5.16 //
GK21sokss_pu:40350: tadrathena sa yāti sma rājā merudhvajaḥ sadā // SoKss_17,5.18 //

GK21sokss_pu:40356: eko gaṇāvatāraś ca dvitīyo malayadhvajaḥ // SoKss_17,5.21 //

GK21sokss_pu:40361: tvaṃ ca vyomacarāv etau samahāstrau gṛhāṇa me /
